title: Best Product EVER!
body: If it were possible to do more stars, I would.  I am 50 years old and I have arthritis in my hip.  I take a prescription medicine to help with the inflammation and pain.  Even with the prescription med, I still have some pain in mobility.  This product changed my life!  I was almost at the point of requesting a hip replacement but I have found this product.  I can say I did not get the same effect from another product that only had Glucosamine.  This product has MSM and I believe it made all the difference.  I take one pill in the morning and another at night.  I was so pleased with this product within the first week I started it, I went ahead and purchased another bottle.  Also, I told my Orthopedic Surgeon about it.  He said that as long as I was comfortable, the surgery can wait.  Here's to hoping for another 10 years before I need to take the surgery plunge!

title: Very promising
body: As I get older, my knees are aching. Never had this problem. Never had a knee injury. I've always been in pretty good shape. But, WTH!!?? It's like all of a sudden, my knees are painful for no reason. I've really been researching, reading a lot of different research results and spoken to others who take supplements. Glucosamine has a lot of support.  I started taking Turmeric supplements and it made a difference, but not 100%.  I added this product recently and I swear I have no more pain in my knees. I'm actually surprised every morning when I walk down stairs and I don't have to go slower because of the knee pain.

title: Fit of inspired motivation
body: I've been working out consistently for the last few years but recently, in a fit of inspired motivation, I started doing CrossFit. Ouch. It's a really great workout but my joints have been feeling pretty achey due to some old injuries, and I've been looking for a way to alleviate the pain.

title: ❌❌ ONE OF THE BEST BRANDS OUT THERE ❌❌
body: While, I, myself don't take Glucosamine... this is a brand my father takes religiously. He attempted using a different brand when the local stores around where I live stopped carrying Schiff, and could almost immediately notice a difference in the way he felt. He was constantly complaining about aches and pains. So when I saw this pop up for the price it was sitting at, I immediately snatched it up!

title: Love it! I was diagnosed with Lyme's Disease 2 ...
body: Love it! I was diagnosed with Lyme's Disease 2 years ago. I got better, but my joints never felt quite right. Maybe it's my age (46 yrs old) or the Lyme's. Don't know, but what I do know is my joints haven't felt this good since before I got sick.  I can jump across the ditch from my goat pen to my shop and it doesn't hurt any more. I have tried other glucosamine products, but with little to no effect. I feel like it is the combo of ingredients in this formula that makes it good. I'm on my feet a lot in my shop and as a lab tech. I'm amazed.

title: Serving size is 3 tablets, so this is a 50 day supply
body: My husband takes Glucosamine with MSM for his arthritic knees and he definitely notices a difference if he stops taking it.  Since it does ease his joint pain, taking the pills has become part of his daily routine.

title: I give it to my dogs
body: I have a couple dogs that have early signs of arthritis so the vet recommended that I give them 1000 mgs of glucosamine daily. Each tablet is 500 mgs so I add a pill to each of their food bowls every morning and evening. Usually I wrap it in cheese. They'll eat it right up. After a couple of weeks, one of my dogs who is usually really stiff when she moves seems to have a looser and more relaxed gait when she walks. The price here is less than if I had bought it at a pet store but if I shop around, I'm sure I can find it at a drugstore or someplace in town for less. Amazon is just convenient and I love being able to buy a large container.

title: An easy source of Glucosamine
body: Not exactly sure how to compare this to other similar products. But they do provide a healthy dose of Glucosamine. The human body really benefits from the product. And dogs do as well!

title: Works for us- humans and dogs- as a high quality, economical option
body: On our Subscribe & Save- for myself & my dogs as a high quality product at an economical price.

title: Could help.
body: Though the systematic reviews of literature relating to glucosamine and joint pain are unclear at best, for the price I thought that I would give this supplement a try. I noticed some crepitus in my left knee when extending from 100 degrees to terminal knee extension.  I'm only 26, and although there was no joint pain yet, I thought maybe I would be doing some favor to my joints by changing up my exercise routine and taking these supplements. I've noticed after a week that the crepitus has lessened somewhat, but it's hard to say specifically that the supplements were the cause of this. For the price, I would say that this supplement might by of some slight benefit.

title: Schiff Gluecosamine Plus MSM, 150 count
body: I have tried many  joint products and they  helped to some degree, but I needed a little more with  the joint pain, read about a lot of products, decided to try this and I love it, so go ahead try it, think you'll like this one

title: Schiff has the right idea
body: while I haven't noticed any dramatic effects from taking Schiff Glucosamine as a stand-alone supplement, adding it to the vitamins I take pre- and post-workout seems to assist in the recovery process. I have been taking glucosamine chondroitin for going on two years and I do notice a difference in the way that my muscles respond to rigorous exercise. Drinking plenty of water also helps, at least half of your body weight in ounces a day.

title: Patellofemoral Syndrome Fixed
body: Started taking these after I was diagnosed with patellofemoral syndrome (knee cap comes off track).  This stuff along with physical therapy makes a huge difference.  I'm almost 100% back to normal after 6 months.  Knee still crickles and cracks every now and then, but no more pain.  Can sprint and stop at full speed playing tennis with absolutely no issues.  I can't tell if the pills helped or if it was just the physical therapy, but whatever the case, my knee is fixed!

title: but I am amazed at how it has helped me
body: I was worried about how this works, but I am amazed at how it has helped me.  My pain has decreased and I feel much better than I have in a long time.  Thank you for having it.

title: I was a skeptic....but these seem to work!
body: I am a man in his early 60's, that does not trust supplements at all. I've never tried anything other than aspirin or Ibuprophen for those 60ish aches and pains. I have had orthoscopic on one knee....and probably need it on the other. I have both worn shoulder rotator cuffs that give me trouble also. I tried this Schiff glucosamine kinda on a whim...or maybe more of desparation...doubting a good result. But...I gotta say...There is a noticeable difference in my joints. I really didn't notice it much until one day I got to my feet, from lying on the floor working on some wiring. As I stood up, I thought....wow!..that wasn't painful at all....My knee has all but stopped hurting. All my joints seem to have benefited. It took a few weeks....taking two pills a day, before I felt better. If I take one of these on an empty stomach, I feel discomfort. I have gotten in the habit of crushing these with a hammer....like taking a BC powder (I take my aspirin that way too...have for decades). I never have an issue when I take it that way. Anyhow....I am convinced this is not a placaebo effect. I would give it a try! (Might wanna ask your Dr. first to be safe).

title: I felt like I was going crazy when at age 30 my ...
body: I use this everyday for knee pain. I felt like I was going crazy when at age 30 my knees started hurting after I sat too long. I started taking these at a nurse friend's recommendation and it helps a lot. It took a few weeks for the glucosamine to build up in my system enough to help. If I stop taking it, about a week later the pain creeps back in.

title: Arthritis help
body: I actually bought this from my mom when she was diagnosed with Arthritis and her pain went away. Before taking this we were constantly at the hospital because my mom would be in pain in several places and then it would go away but then it would come back hence the diagnosis. After a couple of weeks taking this she didn't say anything about having anymore pain. But now she's out of the glucosamine and she's back to hurting again, so be mindful and keep taking this so the pain keeps away.

title: Schiff Gluecosamine Plus MSM, 150 count

title: Helps with Knee Pain
body: My mom has been using this product for almost over a year now.She takes 2 tablets a day and has seen a remarkable difference in her knee pain.For years she has struggled with weak knees.For with regular intake of Glucosamine she has noticed a noticeable difference in her joints. Definitely recommend this for anybody suffering from weak bones, joints.

body: Took the glucosamine for a month and no kidding cured a torn rotator cuff I was scheduled to have surgery on. This stuff is definitely not snake oil. Amazing stuff.

title: I love this product! It works!
body: I love this product!  Was told by my doctor to find a glucosamine vitamin and I chose Schiff.  I noticed a difference in the stiffness in my fingers within the first week!  I took the pills three times a day and felt the results quickly. I highly recommend this product.

title: Satisfied with what it's supposed to do
body: Standard supplement for joint support. It's inexpensive and a good product to help with joint support. I used this in about a month, it's about a month's supply since you take 3 a day. It does what it's supposed to and it's not too pricey. I'm satisfied with this product.

title: Love this product because it works.
body: Love this because it really helps with arthritis.  I've tried many different brands and formulations but truly believe the added hyaluronic acid is what makes the difference over the other glucosamine products I've tried.  Give it a try, you'll be glad you did.

title: An easy source of Glucosamine
body: Not exactly sure how to compare this to other similar products. But they do provide a healthy dose of Glucosamine. The human body really benefits from the product. And dogs do as well!

title: Halted dog's arthritis!
body: One tablet daily makes my 9 year old golden retriever able to move so much easier! Being a service dog makes him age prematurely and his joints started showing their age when he was about 6 years old. On the advice of our vet, we started giving him 1 tablet daily and the progression of his arthritis has stopped. This supplement has bought my golden retriever additional years of work for my son and for the dog. He truly loves to go to work everyday and I think a big part of him would die if we had to take that away from him. Thank you for letting our working dog remain working as long as he wants to!

title: When I hit about 50 years of age I began ...
body: When I hit about 50 years of age I began having hip, knee and elbow joint pains at various times and two nurse friends told me to take Glucosamine with MSM.  Sure enough the pains went away.  I thought it might be just my imagination.  So I stopped taking it, and a few weeks later sure enough the pain was back.  Still not completely convinced, once again, sometime later I stopped again with the exact same results.  Now it is part of my daily regimen and I don't ever plan to stop taking it.  I also find it is cheapest by far online.  I haven't tried any other brands because this works!

title: I sure do I feel it when I run out of this stuff
body: Glucosamine does not help as much as I would like, but I sure do I feel it when I run out of this stuff. Within a weak, the pain is worse than ever.

title: ... was younger and the doctor told me I had bad lubrication around my knees and that taking Glucosamine would ...
body: I started running more - around about the same amount I used to do when I was younger and the doctor told me I had bad lubrication around my knees and that taking Glucosamine would help. I completely forgot about this until recently and I started getting the pains again. These pills have made the difference. I'm running 3 to 5 miles a few times a week, and the pain has stopped, so happy days overall :)

Using this brand over another didn't show any difference that I could tell, but maybe I've been on it so long, one meshes with the other. I would definitely use this brand again, but I will use other brands too.

title: Works miracles.
body: My mother in law swears by these.  She first tried these 5 years ago on a trip to America.  When she runs out, she says that she can tell the difference the next day because of the pain.  We make sure that she always has these.  We have tried another brand, but she did not have the same results.  I know that she was accurate, because she did not know we changed the brand.  So, this is the only one that we recommend and purchase.  Schiff changes their label a lot.  So we always have to look for the ingredients when looking at their jars.

title: MSM makes the difference
body: My husband uses this product daily for the bone-on-bone pain in his knees. His doctors recommended glucosamine with chondroitin, which he tried for years, but his knee pain never seemed to improve. After switching to glucosamine with MSM, his knees felt markedly better. There is still pain, but it's diminished significantly. Trying to save a couple dollars, I recently purchased Schiff glucosamine without MSM. Within days, my husband could tell the difference. He needed the MSM. We don't know what the MSM does, but whatever it is, it works.

title: I now get around like I did 20 years ago

title: Halted dog's arthritis!
body: One tablet daily makes my 9 year old golden retriever able to move so much easier! Being a service dog makes him age prematurely and his joints started showing their age when he was about 6 years old. On the advice of our vet, we started giving him 1 tablet daily and the progression of his arthritis has stopped. This supplement has bought my golden retriever additional years of work for my son and for the dog. He truly loves to go to work everyday and I think a big part of him would die if we had to take that away from him. Thank you for letting our working dog remain working as long as he wants to!

title: Relieved our arthritis pain.
body: My wife and I both take this for arthritis pain in our hands. It amazingly relieves all the pain, with no need for any pain medication. But, it does take a little time for it to build up in your system before the pain disappears...at least for us with our arthritis. We both took 3 pills/day for 2 weeks before we saw any noticeable improvement. It took almost a month of 3 pills /day before all of the pain was gone. So give it some time to work. After a few months we were able to go down to 2 pills/day, and are still pain free after 4 years.

title: Great product for aiding joint pain, discomfort with quick results.

I have been doing this routine for many years and found that as I'm getting older, my joints and bones start to get more achy. Especially after exercises involving my elbows and knees. I started taking Schiff Glucosmaine and noticed within a week or so that the achy feelings were dissipating.

title: If you have knee pain, try this one out!

My ortho PA said for it has no effect for some, but it has good effect on others - so it's like a hit and miss. I have recently started feeling pain on my knee and it made me think I might want to start taking Glucosamine again. So it has been a month now that I resumed taking it, and the pain in my knee has started to diminish. I may not be sure this is a direct effect, since I also take other supplements and that Winter is coming to an end. But I'd like to believe that it helped. This brand came in with rewards points you earn when you register the code that accompanied it.

title: Relieved our arthritis pain.
body: My wife and I both take this for arthritis pain in our hands. It amazingly relieves all the pain, with no need for any pain medication. But, it does take a little time for it to build up in your system before the pain disappears...at least for us with our arthritis. We both took 3 pills/day for 2 weeks before we saw any noticeable improvement. It took almost a month of 3 pills /day before all of the pain was gone. So give it some time to work. After a few months we were able to go down to 2 pills/day, and are still pain free after 4 years.

title: Far cheaper and more potent  than doggie versions

title: Works For Me

I do not have the stiffness and swelling I have been experiencing for a year. It may not do much for the pain of daily stress, but I appreciate the increased mobility.

title: Dramatic joint pain decrease

title: great addition to multi vitamins

If u miss 2-3 days and still do activity u realize that there is a difference,  your joints will feel squeaky and not as responsive.

title: By way of background information, I had ACL injury ...
body: By way of background information, I had ACL injury 10 years ago which was repaired surgically. Then 6 months ago, I got injured again at a soccer game and both the ACL and PCL were torn this time. Not yet ready for a second surgery on the same knee, so I decided to do physical therapy in addition to taking knee supplements. In the past three months, I have used this product and it seems to be helping a lot with my knee issues, although I would think that the improvement could be due to a combination of other factors in addition to the beneficial effects of the supplements. As such, I will keep using this supplement for a while and see where things are, one year from now..

title: It really is a miracle
body: I'm a 47 y/o nurse, I'm on my feet constantly during a ten hour shift. The only time I get to sit, is on a stool with no back support, and it's like going from a squatting position to standing at least 30 to 40 times a day. I've ordered this supplement before, but thought that maybe the weather was so dry( no rain at all for months), I didn't give it the credit it deserved. As it turns out, taking this supplement was part of the reason I felt so good, going on bike rides for sometimes 2 hours at a time. It wasn't until after I worked crazy hours over the week of this thanksgiving, that I woke up wanting to scream. Barley able to move from knee and low back pain, I got up grabbed the iPad and ordered this wonderful capsule for a second time. Thanks to "prime" I had taken 3 capsules by that evening around 8 pm. The next morning, I felt better but thought I should stay home..I took more as directed by the packaging. By noon I felt like I had never had knee pain before! Afte 3 days I started feeling more adventurous, so I did an hour on my treadmill at home. I had also noticed something that I thought was just a fluke, I had erections all night for the past 2 nights. This prompted me to look up this MSM part of the supplement, to my surprise MSM is massively helpful for restoring vital youthful effects. Like hair re growth, collagen production, wrinkle reduction, abdominal health. The list goes on and on and on. Long story short, the sexual side effects have "happily" continued..lol it's been a week. Work has been a breeze, I've had more exercise at home, I've had great sexual vitality with my spouse and that makes a better home. I plan on taking this supplement for 3 months, going off for one month, then going right back on it.

title: deceptive dosage description
body: On product descriptions, usually the back side of the bottles are shown in photos, in order to see what the suggested dosage is supposed to be, to make sure you are comparing "apples to apples."  This product does not show the back of the bottle on the photos, but in the written material, refers to a "dosage of two capsules," leaving me, at least, with the impression that the suggested dosage would be two capsules, which would make this a good buy.  Instead, when it arrived, when I looked on the back of the bottle, it turns out the suggested dosage is FIVE capsules, makeing this a rather poor buy.  I will do another brand next time, not this one.

title: Ok, Ok....I am a believer.
body: Hey!  I should teach the kids tennis.....aching knee.....diagnosis....torn cartridge but not bad enough for surgery yet.  I am not a big supplement person.  However, with an aching knee, I came across the Dr. Tobias Hip, Knee, Joint and noticed the large number of great reviews.  What the heck....lets try.  I suffered knee pain for 6 weeks.  After only 5-6 days of taking Dr. Tobias, knee pain gone ....FINALLY!.  Wait, maybe the knee just stopped hurting on its own....so I stopped taking after a week of no pain.  After a few days, the pain returns.  Wait....maybe I just restrained it.  I started Dr. Tobias again and 4 days or so later.....no knee pain.  I am sold.  I did not like the 5 pill a day dosage  and a major big box had a sale on a joint supplement that includes 2 of the 3 active ingredients listed in Dr. Tobias.  I decide to try that and save some money and only 2 pills per day.  After several days, knee pain returns ...though on the mild side.  Hummmm maybe Dr. Tobias has better absorption or that third ingredient is really important.  Started taking Dr. Tobias again.....no knee pain at all.  I am sold!  This stuff is amazing.

title: I recommend you try these supplements for your joints
body: This joint supplement worked quickly to my surprise, I actually noticed a difference the next day. I used to take Chondroitin, Glucosamine & MSM years ago using other supplement brands and they always worked, but usually I didn't notice a difference until after a few weeks of use. When I was in the Army, I was told that I had Patella Femoral Syndrome, so basically my knees were shot from overuse of crazy Physical Training sessions.  I hadn't used joint supplements for about 4 or 5 years now, I just dealt with any pain and limited my leg workouts accordingly.  I decided to increase my leg workouts and up the intensity, however, my knees were getting super sore.  I had to try something because I was not going to pop pain killers everyday and I did not want my fitness goals to suffer.

title: Magic pills changed my life!
body: I swear these pills are like a blessing in a bottle! I have been suffering with knee pain for years and have spent quite a bit of money at the doctor trying to fix the issue but still no relief. I've now been using these pills for 3 months and I feel like the old me again. I typically take 2-3 pills per day and it makes a world of difference. The only real downside is after about 3 days of not taking the pills the pain comes right back. I would definitely recommend!!!!

title: They really do help
body: I never review things, but have to say these really seemed to help my knees. I know there is no medical proof they work, but after three knee surgeries, these are the ONLY thing I have tried that seem to help. I have been back to running without pain again! I usually dont believe in natural supplements, but these have changed my mind.

title: Great product!!
body: Purchased this product along with Dr. Tobias Fish Oil for excruciating pain in my knees due to Lymes Disease.  Walking was so painful and steroid injections didn't help.  Doctor recommended I take quality grade Glucosamine and Fish Oil.  The results after 3 weeks has been amazing.  It has helped my pain tremendously and this company has excellent customer service and follow up.  Highly recommend.

title: Dr. Tobias MSM seems to be working well for me.
body: This seems to help a little with achy joints and flexibility and hopefully will allow me to age just a little more gracefully.  I'm 43 and have a bad back and this has helped a little.  It's not a miracle drug, but these supplements have been proven to help.  Nice price, I absolutely LOVE Dr. Tobias' supplements - I take their Vitality and Omega-3 Triple-Strength and very happy with all of them.

title: Three weeks in and seems to be working
body: I was told by my podiatrist that I had some early evidence of arthritis in my big toe joint. When I asked what, if anything, I could do he suggested taking glucosamine. Not everyone benefits from it, he said, but many do so I decided to start taking it. Upon looking into what brand or type to take, I found there are two types, with glucosamine and chondrotilin suspended in sulfate salts recommended. I've been taking Dr. Tobias MS Glucosamine for about 3 weeks and see some improvement. I'm not sure if it's a placebo effect or real but I'm satisfied so far and plan to continue using it.

title: Skeptic to believer
body: The number of reviews from people who said they experienced a reduction in pain after taking this product, was the reason I decided to try it. My skepticism left after 3 days when my knee pain was gone! The relief continues. That doesn't mean I'm cured - there still is no cure for arthritis. And I still must be careful not to twist my knee. But it does mean that the constant pain is gone. I take the recommended 5 pills a day, and will continue.

title: I've used other brands but have found that I enjoy more relief taking these
body: I've used other brands but have found that I enjoy more relief taking these. I am retired and working part time in one of the major retail stores. Standing and walking on the concrete floors were getting tough to bear .  I also want to mention that I enjoy crocheting.  Because of the aching joints in the fingers, I was doing less and less.  Not anymore. Hands and fingers much better! I would recommend this product to anyone looking for relief .

body: this product is a most have in your supplement intake everyday, I use this product because I have a very physical job as delivery driver and it really put a lot of stress on my joints geting on and off the truck at least 300 hundred times a day plus lifting heavy boxes all day, after I started taking Dr tobias MSM Glucosamine it has been a night and day difference I get up out of bed feeling good no joint pain my knees as a very smooth feeling without any pain and I am happy every morning I can go back to work without  pain, no to mention that I had a meniscus surgery on my right knee and I was always worry about it because  I could feel the stress every day now its off my mind and is a good feeling knowing am helping my knee to stay healthy. Keep up the good Work Doctor  tobias you are Making a difference on peoples life. Thanks.

I researched a few different brands and decided I would go with Dr. Tobias. It's only been 4 days, but I've noticed a slight improvement in my hips. They're still hurting, but the pain is now bearable. I'm hoping the further into the bottle I get the better the results. So far, a great product.

Ankles, hips, elbows, knees, and wrists - all in constant pain. Getting up in the morning,  I felt like an arthritic 75 year old man. I honestly thought I had ruined my body and I was trapped like that forever. I researched glucosamine chondroitn and saw Dr. Tobais brand on Amazon. It said "Hips, knees,  and joints" , and had many positive reviews. I ordered it, and after taking the product for 4 short days, I had my life back. Elbow pain gone. Knee pain gone. Ankle pain gone. Hip pain reduced by 80%, wrist pain by 75%. I can move,  lift, and live normally again. Thank you,  Dr. Tobais. (Honest review, NO discount received)

A friend of mine suggested I start taking a full therapeutic dose of Glucosamine/Chondroitin, in my search in Amazon I wanted a capsule presentation as the big tablet is an issue for me, I found this product and received it very fast.  After just a few days of taking it I started feeling better and now, after about 2-3 weeks, I have almost no pain, but will keep taking it.  it is a great alternative and definitely safer than NSAIDs

title: take it every day!
body: I've been using this product for a bit over 5 years.  It makes a huge difference in the arthritis in my knees.  In the five years, I ran out a couple times and didn't take them for about 4-5 days each time.  By then, my knee reminded me of why I need to take them every day!  I have even tried experimenting with taking one a day.  It takes almost two weeks, but the inflammation in the knee starts to build up and there is pain again.

title: They cost more than some, and work better than anything else for knee pain
body: I have tried generic glucosamine (the main ingredient in all of these 'joint pills' and a couple of other brands, and much to my shock, these are noticeably better. I wasn't willing to believe that for a while, so I'd try something else, and after a week or two on the other version, my knee pain (especially going down stairs, which I dreaded) the pain would get worse.

title: Excellent product
body: These work very well.  If I don't take them for a week or two, I can really tell.  The knees get very painful.  Just take two a day and keep it up.  It really helps.  These are my favorite since they are the smaller pills.  Some glucosamine can be huge tablets and very hard to swallow.  These are very easy to use.

title: Joint pain relief in a tablet
body: I used to have joint pain in one of my knees, which would come & go with changes in the weather.  Since I have been taking the glucosamine - chondroitin, I no longer have any pain in my knee!  It took a couple of months before I noticed the diminishing pain, but now it is totally gone.  I will continue to use this product - forever.  No pain feels really good.

title: I recommend this product for my orthopedic patients!
body: Not only do my wife and I use this great supplement for knee pain, I recommend it to my orthopedic patients with specific or generalized joint pain. It takes 2-3 weeks and you'll find yourself doing things more than you were and feeling better. It's quite remarkable!

title: worth a try, but didn't ultimately end up doing a whole lot for me
body: After taking almost the whole bottle of this, I am at a point where I have to decide whether or not to reorder.  I think I won't, because I just don't feel this is doing a whole lot for me.  I can maybe feel some changes, but not really enough for me to want to continue swallowing three extra pills every day.  I would revisit this in the future if my problems get worse (right now they're fairly manageable on their own).  For the record, I am 38 and don't have arthritis right now, but based on family history, that will likely be in my future.

title: Alternative Glucosamine
body: I am allergic to shrimp which is what most glucosamine is made from.  This glucosamine, however,  is made from corn.  It has reduced my discomfort considerably in the three months I've been using it.

title: Getting in shape does not have to be painful!!!
body: Some years ago I had taken a Glucosamine product and didn't really notice a difference.  About 5 years ago, I tore my meniscus from a mishap on the stairs.  Orthopedic doc sent me on my way, said if it didn't get better, I might want to consider surgery.  Pain would come back periodically, but nothing that couldn't be tolerated.  Folks I spoke to said avoid surgery if you can.  Trying to be health conscious and get in shape after being a slug for years, I join gym and found the pain came back full force.  A friend at the gym suggested I try Glucosamine, it might help.  I am allergic to shellfish.  I take a Deva multi vitamin and searched around and found this at a great price.  I didn't take it consistently, had pain periodically (whenever I exercised).  I thought I would be doomed to not being able to get in shape because of pain forever.  I have been taking consistently and it feels great!!  I forgot what it felt like to be able to walk without pain. I look forward to my workouts now. :-)

title: Great for people and animals!
body: I first purchased this for my old dog who has had a lot of pain and often was completely lame in one leg. It worked miracles in less than a week! I couldn't believe how quickly she improved. It keeps her pain-free as long as I put one crushed up in her food each night. (She is 25lbs) If I skip a day she will be limping in the morning. Now my husband also takes it to help with his joints. It is great to find a vegetarian alternative that really works!

title: Very Helpful
body: This product has definitely helped reduce my back and joint pain after about three weeks of taking three tabs daily. Highly recommended, whether your pain is from an old injury or arthritis.

title: It works to reduce my arthritic pain!
body: I broke my ankles very badly a few years ago and was left with intense arthritic pain in one ankle.  Eventually a chiropractor recommended glucosamine to help prevent further deterioration of the joint.  I began taking it not expecting it to help with my chronic pain in walking, but after two weeks I began noticing a huge reduction in my pain!

title: Naturally reduced inflammation and pain
body: Vegan was no.1 reason for using this kind of supplement. No weird aftertaste. After 3-4 weeks I did feel a difference. Lowered my inflammatory episodes in my knees. Anything that lowers pain for me naturally is on my must have list.

title: Deva Glucosamine
body: This product works very well for me. It is tough to find a good quality glucosamine made without shellfish that can do the job, but this one fits the bill. I have used this product for quite a while now, and I can honestly say that it does help me with knee issues. That is saying a lot, since I do stand on my feet for several hours in my job. I appreciate such a great product at a reasonable price. Thank you.

title: Horrible taste but love that theyre vegan
body: Horrible taste as you swallow but wanted vegan......

title: Five Stars

title: Used to stop Knee discomfort
body: I do a lot of exercising, play basketball. I am getting older  and was beginning to experience discomfort in my knees. Brother told me about using glucosamine. So I started using this product and a calcium supplement. The discomfort disappeared in about two weeks. I now play basketball almost every day without any discomfort. I really think this product has made a difference.

title: Great choice for vegan athletes
body: I was a little skeptical when purchasing this product. In my (nonvegan) past, I'd used OTC Glucosamine/Chondroitin tabs before to help with knee pain when running. Since having gone vegan, I was looking for a product that could help with the knee pain, without the chondroitin. This product worked wonders! I'm so glad there is a reliable vegan product out there to turn to.

title: Senior dog
body: I give this (along with another dog joint "treat") to my older dog who has arthritis.  Without it she was laying around more often than not, and was having trouble walking more than a block. With this in her regimen, she's been a lot friskier and has started becoming more playful. I give her one to two a day with her food (break the pill in half and drop the two pieces into her bowl) and have no problem with her taking it in.

title: Just as good as the real thing
body: I know this is not from any shellfish, but I have to say this stuff works just as good.  I, like other reviews, take three pills every day (to make sure I get the amount of glucosamine that works for me of 1500 milligrams).  I have taken this for over about 3 months now and have gone off and on it for my knee pain from installing floors/cleaning floors and working in a retail stocking environment for over 14 years.  I just hit 33 last year and for the first time in my life I am getting knee pain just working as a retail distributor.  I played basketball in the past but was afraid too, but after reading some of these reviews I may now start again since it's working so good!  Every time I go off of it for five times now after about 2 to 4 days I have to take it again for a few days to be pain free again.  It is hard to believe something vegan can work like this, that is why I had to prove it to myself after going off of it for 5 times with a two month supply. You won't regret this stuff!  All of my friends are getting knee surgery if they don't take a Glucosamine supplement.  (Half are.) Now I am now avoiding surgery too!  Hot dog!!!

title: wonderful vegan product for minor joint pain
body: I originally purchased this product for my mother who has experienced quite a bit of knee pain and some slight shoulder pain. Primarily these pains were in the joints. She didn't have great reactions to non-vegan products that are made from shellfish or other fish products so I decided to go vegan for her. She's experiencing quite a bit less discomfort in her knees and shoulders and honestly hasn't complained about them in quite some time.

title: Very effective for my dogs
body: All three of my dogs take this supplement daily. Our veterinarian recommended glucosamine with MSM. I was buying a dog-specific version and with three large dogs it was costing over $100 a month. I take two Deva supplements myself, so I was confident in the quality of their product. This Deva glucosamine has been as, if not more, effective than the other brand and for a fraction of the cost. Amazon Subscribe & Save makes it easy to be sure we always have a full bottle. My oldest dog (he's 8 1/2) used to have stiffness whenever he got up and he would hang out and watch while the other dogs ran and played. After about a month of him taking glucosamine daily I really started to see a difference. Now, after almost a year, he hops right up, joins in the fun and runs like a puppy and it makes me so happy. I hope by starting the younger dogs on this supplement early, it will give them many more pain-free years.

title: Very large tablets
body: These pills were too large for me to swallow, so this review is simply to warn anyone who has trouble swallowing large pills or capsules - These tablets are ¾" long and more than 1/4 " wide. I love the Deva brand, and swear by their multivitamins, Vitamin D2, and Flaxseed Omega 3.  But the Glucosamine, MSM & CMO combination tablet is very large.  If you have no problem with large tablets, you cannot go wrong with the Deva brand.

title: My skin turned red and felt like I got a fever

Did not know what was wrong until my Doctor noticed it, because he knows I am  healthy, do not even drink and exercise every day.  Even though it says vegan, its something wrong.  I had my mom and my brother to test it to be sure, same thing happened to them too.  Hope Amazon take this into their consideration and stop this product. I will attempt to find the regular ones rather than purchase these again as the regular are smaller and easier to swallow with no funny taste.

title: Great product for joint pain and those of us who keep kosher!
body: I have had two knee surgeries. One for a torn meniscus, another for both a torn meniscus and ACL. I suffer from arthritis now. After hearing from friends that Glucosamine Condroitin. helps their arthritis pain, I thought I'd try it. Most Glucosamine Condroitin are derived from shellfish and sharks. I keep kosher, so those were not an option. It was nice to find a vegan alternative that doesn't use animal products. The use of both CMO and MSM is nice, most Glucosamine Condroitin don't include both. I take this in conjunction with Carlson or Nordic Naturals Fish Oil and together they kill my arthritis pain. When I run out, the pain returns. That is all the 'medical proof' I need!

title: Vegan glucosamine

title: Disappointed with DEVA due to lack of customer service.
body: I am disappointed with DEVA because I called and e-mailed their customer service four times and no one ever got back to me. I just got a voice message when I called them - no live person.  I wanted to know where the corn comes from (what country and state) and if it is organic.  I know it's GMO free, but the label does not say it's organic or where it comes from. I also wanted to know where the Boswellia extract comes from and if that is GMO free or organic.  Because of their lack of customer service and my unanswered questions, my dad and I have both stopped using this product.  Also, we did not notice a great deal of difference in how our joints felt, even after using the product long term.  We used it because it was the only vegetarian source of glucosamine we could find.  There may be others out there, however.

title: Good vegan option if you need glucosamine
body: Good vegan glucosamine option - but check with your doctor first! I started up my exercise routine and have been experiencing joint ache and thought this would help. The pain did go away with two pills a day (morning and afternoon), however the bloating and water retention was nuts: I gained about five pounds in water and my fingers and feet would itch and be puffy when I woke up in the morning. Over the morning the puff/itch would go away, only to come back again the next morning. The morning after I stopped these pills, the puff/itch was gone and has yet to return.

title: something is missing

title: No Scientific Evidence for Benefits of Glucosamine for Joints
body: Silly me - I purchased this without doing good-enough research.  Turns out the evidence that glucosamine supports joint health just isn't there.

title: Works for me
body: I have arthritis in both hip joints and now in both knees.  I am a walker and love to go longer distances.  I've used these for years.  According to scientific studies, Glucosamine/Chondritin mixtures do not work any better than placebos.  If that's the case, they do a really good job on my mind. They do not work immediately after starting on them, and take some time to build up in your systerm.  After reading the study, I tried going without them for 3 weeks.  By the end of the 3rd week, I was unable to walk long distances again.  I went back on the pills and in 3-4 weeks, I was back to normal.

title: One of the best things for knee, elbow or any joint health!

This price is comparable, plus I save on transportation costs, not to mention, I do not have to schlep all over the store for other stuff too.  The product is worthwhile.  It saves your knees and other joints.  As we age, there are parts of us that get creaky, and do not work as well.  This has all three of the substances that help joint health.

title: Miracle joint pain relief
body: After hearing about how good Glucosamine is from several sources I decided to give this a shot.  This helps considerably with my knee pain.  When I was 18 I tore my Miniscus in my knee and it still eventually will need surgery to fix the problem.  So far buying a bottle of this is far cheaper than getting surgery so it will give me time to save up to afford it.  With this I am able to work my normal 12hr shift in a warehouse on concrete all day doing lifting and my knees do fine.  Before taking this the pain was getting rather intense, even would have to call off work at times because of it.  This stuff seriously works wonders, the pain now is almost non existent as long as I am careful.  I would highly recommend this to anyone with joint pain, it really helps.

title: Doggie Delight
body: I  give these to my old dog per my verts recommendation. She eats them in her food, no problem. She had started to hobble and limp and not run and play due to her hips getting arthritic. I  give the dose the vet said and she runs and plays again.

title: Lube up those creaking joints !
body: As I've gotten older I've found I need a supplement to help keep these old joints moving . This Nature Made Triple Flex works as well as the higher priced ones and I'm able to move my joints with relative ease . Too much football as a kid and young man has left me with a bad knee , a bad shoulder and a bad hip . This stuff helps keep me moving without spending a fortune.

title: takes time, but seems positive to me

title: This Product Works For Me
body: I am now on my third bottle of these capsules. I initially bought them because I have arthritis pain in my neck, and extensive research showed me about the only thing I could do for it was to take Glucosamine & Chondroitin, both in their SULFATE formulations. I checked all local sources, and almost all formulations available were HCl - not Sulfate. Where Sulfate was available, it was for only one, not both of these supplements. So I went online and found this product.

title: Steps cannot keep me down :)
body: I waited for reviewing until after I had used the product for two months.  I have arthritis in both knees and have had surgery on one.  With this supplement I can now climb steps without severe pain and having to rest my legs before trying the steps again.  Just today I brought several loads from my car without hesitation.  The two flights at my daughter's home have also become easier to climb.

title: Great product
body: I have shopped around for glucosamine/chondroitin supplements for years now, trying to find the best price and formula for my osteoarthritis. I was surprised that I need to take 4 capsules daily to get the full 1500/1000 triple-strength dosage with this Vita-Breeze product. When I first purchased this, I thought it was a fantastic price, but then I found out I need to take 4 capsules instead of two daily. But, after just one week taking this supplement, I feel much, much better.  I am able to cut down on my anti-inflammatory pain pills, and my joints and spine feel better than they have in years!  I am sold on the product and will gladly spend a little bit more every month to have a more pain-free existence.  I can walk longer, and may even be able to start jogging and biking again this summer.  I am sure it must be the extra ingredients, the MSM and turmeric that makes the difference.

title: It is a very important part of my wellness regiment
body: I am in my early 30's but I have suffered with joint pain and other inflammatory issues for years, first occuring as a teen, but flaring up quite frequently over the last several years. During my last visit with my rheumatologist, I was diagnosed with osteoarthritis. I thought that might be part of the issue, but it doesn't explain everything. My husband takes glucosamine for his joints and suggested that I try it. We are both very active, although I have been much less active over the last 2 years due to my health issues. I am careful about supplements, and I avoid taking medication unless I absolutely have to, so I did some reseach and decided to try this product. I am on my 2nd bottle of this supplement and it has helped me tremendously. It is a very important part of my wellness regiment and I strongly believe it has contributed greatly to the decrease in the pain and discomfort I felt daily in my joints, which is priceless! Living in pain everyday is depressing and tiring. I am so thankful to have found this supplement. It has truly helped me to take my life back!

title: Eased The Pain 80%+
body: I purchased the product and was hoping it would work.  It reduced my pain in my knees at least 80%.  It is hard to assign an exact number, but that is the best estimate I can provide.  I live with daily knee pain and am feeling relief when I take this supplement. I believe its the addition of Turmeric which has made the difference from the other products on the market. Give this a try so you can experience the same results.

title: Highly recommend this product.
body: I started taking this supplement after my doctor suggested glucosamine for the increasing pain in my knees and hands. I'm only in my 50s, so I wanted to take care of this problem early before it gets much worse.

title: Works better than I ever imagined.
body: I've taken Glucosamine and Chondroitin before for short periods and given up because they just didn't seem to have any effect at all.  I have unpleasant knees, a product of both some birth abnormality and some arthritis as a result.  Aleve helps a lot but I felt like there must be more help out there and I get acupuncture.  My acupuncturist suggested I try Glucosamine and Chondroitin with Turmeric and MSM, although she didn't specify a brand.  I just went on Amazon, read the reviews and chose this product, honestly not expecting much.  What surprised me the most was that I noticed a difference so soon.  At first, I just thought I was having some good days but now the difference has lasted and clearly it's a result of this product.  When I get up my knees aren't so stiff, I can walk farther and stand longer with little discomfort.  Last Friday I went to an exhibition and the gallery has a concrete floor.  I stood there talking to people for 2 hours, something I just couldn't have done before, and then went to dinner with friends and after sitting for perhaps 3 hours, I could just stand up and walk away from the table.  It may seem like I'm giving you too much information but I can't tell you how surprised I am by the difference this product has made.  Honestly I'm shocked.

title: High quality ingredients!

Most of the cheap supplements use Glucosamine HCl (Hydochloride) which hasn't been tested and companies use it because it's cheaper. It's definitely worth the extra money for quality ingredients and I'm very happy with my purchase. I've read a lot about how beneficial Turmeric is too, so I'm glad I'm getting that as an added bonus too!

title: "THAT'S WHAT I'M TALKING ABOUT !!!"
body: I experienced a sudden onset of pain and stiffness in my knees. I tried straight glucosamine supplements, which provided little relief. title: Purchased as a daily supplement for my dog
body: I purchased this to give as a daily supplement to my aging 10 year old beagle.  The senior food we put him on briefly that had added glucosamine was making him fat and so we switched him back to his lite food that he loves.  But then we wanted to supplement his diet with glucosamine so that he could still get that benefit.  While there are glucosamine supplements designed specifically for dogs in treat form, they are much, much pricier than the human pills.  And my vet actually recommended a human version over a dog made one.  I simply open up the capsule and sprinkle the powder in my dog's nightly green bean treat.  He's been on it for about 3 months now.  He seems more spry and doesn't get as stiff after getting up from a nap or after a few heavy days of play at doggy day care.

title: Amazing product.
body: I am utterly amazed at how well this product works. A couple of years ago my knee really started bothering me. Visited a orthopedic clinic and discovered that I have osteoarthritis in both knees. Been very athletic my whole life so it really isn't a surprise that I have this kind of damage. However, it was to the point where walking up stairs or kneeling was pretty painful and the pain would linger. I love to ski and the only way it was bearable was by wearing a knee brace. I started researching my options, all of which involved doctors and lots of money. In doing my research I came across this product on Amazon and figured what do I have to lose? I'm so glad I decided to try it. Been taking it for about a month now and the pain is nearly gone. I still ski with the brace but now I can take it to another level because I'm confident my knee isn't going to give out on me and I'm virtually pain free. I haven't experience any side affects at all. The only thing is the smell. You definitely can smell the turmeric. The capsules are on the larger side so keep that in mind. I would highly recommend these to anyone suffering from osteoarthritis.

However, I think it should be noted that like anything else this doesn't work miracles and this isn't for breakthrough pain. If you are having an episode of extreme pain this isn't the ticket but taking it as a supplement which is exactly what it is will help over time. I hope this helps.

body: I am 63 years old and approximately 1 1/2 years ago, I "tore" my meniscus in my right knee.  After intense pain, a couple cortisone shots by my MD, and a visit to the "specialist", I was told it was "arthritis" and was prescribed pain pills as there was nothing they could do with the cartilage but remove it which would be worse.  The specialist suggested a supplement.  I purchased this product and then purchased a couple of different products with no noticeable change, so I came back to this one.  I was in a lot of pain, and still experience some pain/discomfort, however, I am finding I can go back to walking almost 3 miles when I was down to nothing or maybe a mile and a half before I had to give up. There seems to be improvement and  I have noticed a decrease in the pain, an ability to walk more with my dog which I love!  I will purchase this product again.

I checked on Amazon and found the Vita Breeze Glucosamine, Chondroitin, MSM, Turmeric supplement. I had long heard about the benefits of Glucosamine and Chondroitin with MSM, so that decision was a no-brainer. I also read that turmeric was beneficial for inflammation, which was the major issue with both of my ailments. When I found Glucosamine, Chondroitin, MSM & Turmeric, I was excited that I found all in one supplement. The reviews were extremely favorable, so I gave it a try. Within a day of me trying the supplement my pain had decreased drastically and now a month and a half later, the pain is gone. What an amazing product.

title: It really does help!
body: I recently turned 55 and have had trouble with my knees the last few years. Mostly pain and stiffness,if I over-exercised. Walking down stairs can be uncomfortable. I went to an orthopedist and he said I had Patellar tendinitis. Ibuprofen and Alleve help but I wanted to be more proactive. I did some research and Glucosamine was a recommended supplement. The VitaBreeze product also included Tumeric which was also recommended.

I've been buying this product from Vitabreeze for about a year and for the price and the results, you can't go wrong with this supplement!

title: Order this product it actually works!!!
body: After looking around at different supplements I decided on this one.  I had previously taken one from a local drug store for about 6 months and it made a dramatic difference but I didn't want to have to keep going to the store and this gets delivered right to my door for a better price than locally.  I know it takes around 2-3 months to really feel the difference with these supplements so I hesitated writing a review in case it didn't work, but now after around a month and a half I can already tell a difference.  My joints definitely don't ache as much which is amazing for me since I've dealt with joint pain for years.  I'm starting to be able to move around more and stairs are not the enemy to my knees.  The best thing I love is that it's a capsule not a huge pill, it makes it so much easier to swallow.  You have to take anywhere from 2-4 of these no matter where you get it and it's so much easier to swallow 4 capsules than 4 pills.  For anyone trying to decide if you should make this purchase I recommend fully that you do!  It has the right dosage amounts and when I received my package it was in great shape.  I plan to continue ordering this product from this company for as long as I can because it works and it's definitely cost efficient.

About two weeks of taking it, I began to feel a significant reduction in my joint aches. Since I've also been reducing my weight successfully since Nov 1 (down 27 lbs!) using the Weight Watcher's program, I can't say with 100% certainty that all of the reduction in my pain is because of this supplement but I do believe that it definitely has played a major part. An unexpected benefit as been the significant improvement in my IBS symptoms!

title: Purchased as a daily supplement for my dog
body: I purchased this to give as a daily supplement to my aging 10 year old beagle.  The senior food we put him on briefly that had added glucosamine was making him fat and so we switched him back to his lite food that he loves.  But then we wanted to supplement his diet with glucosamine so that he could still get that benefit.  While there are glucosamine supplements designed specifically for dogs in treat form, they are much, much pricier than the human pills.  And my vet actually recommended a human version over a dog made one.  I simply open up the capsule and sprinkle the powder in my dog's nightly green bean treat.  He's been on it for about 3 months now.  He seems more spry and doesn't get as stiff after getting up from a nap or after a few heavy days of play at doggy day care.

body: As with any OTC I was hesitant to spend $30 for something from a company I have never heard of. I see decided to give this stuff a shot(and move to a warmer climate) and so far I am noticing HUGE improvement after 30days. I have almost ZERO joint pain and am down to 3 pain relievers...A WEEK! I will continue to order this product!

title: good quality ingredients
body: I have arthritis in my back, my knees, and my shoulders, etc.. I live with this unpleasant pain for last 15 years. Of course, tried  many different things, but with very little relief , unfortunately. After taking this product,  my pain level decreased from 5-6 on pain scale 0-10, to 1-3. Definitely will continue to use this product. And my little advice: try to combine it with gluten free diet for better results.

body: I have taken glucosamine supplements for a while now to help with joint pain and discomfort.  When it came time to get more, I wanted something with chondroitin in it as well. Naturally, I still "feel it" when the cooler weather moves into the area, but on a daily basis, I'm not bothered much by joint paint or stiffness. title: Knee is happy
body: These pills have really made a difference for me and I have decided to add then to my Amazon quarterly subscription.  I was suffering from a mild knee pain on one leg when going up or down the stairs as it felt like my knee was giving out and there was a sharp pain with each step.  Taking these pills since two weeks ago has eliminated this pain and I can move up and down the stairs with a lot more ease.  The Turmeric in these pills made it a lot more attractive to me comparing to other Glucosamine pills.  Turmeric has anti-inflamatory properties which is a natural substance which is used in a lot of Asian cooking.  However, in US we don't generally get enough of this herb and these pills provide the combination of Turmeric & Glucosamine that help alleviate the problems with inflamed joints.

title: This spring it got to the point that when I woke each morning the pain was so bad I could not lift my arms above my head
body: During the past few years I have been experiencing pain in my shoulders and hands. I just attributed this to old age (I am now 81). I've heard good things about glucosamine/chondroitin for joint pain, so I thought I'd check it out.  I went on Amazon and searched for a highly rated & affordable product.  I found these capsules from VitaBreeze which, as a bonus, also includes tumeric (I'd heard lots of good things about tumeric for joint pain too) and MSM (whatever that is!).  I started taking these capsules the first of November 2015 and within two weeks the difference was noticable and significant!  The relief from my joint pain has improved even more since then.  I take two capsules in the morning and two capsules in the evening.  Today I noiticed myself bouncing up the stairs, and am so happy!  Thank you VitaBreeze!

title: It works.
body: I found a good book about arthritis ("The Arthritis Handbook: Improve Your Health and Manage the Pain of Osteoarthritis" by Grant Cooper, M.D.) that recommended glucosamine sulfate to rebuild cartilage. But the studies it cited showed results only from glucosamine SULFATE; glucosamie HCL wasn't effective. Well, finding the sulfate compound wasn't easy; both the online offerings and my drugstore shelves were HCL. I finally tracked this down and gave it a try. I've now been taking it for 26 months, so I guess it's time to write a review. Summary: When I started it, I was no longer able to kneel in church; now I can. I'm usually skeptical about supplements, but this one works.

title: Best So Far!
body: This is a much easier pill to swallow! the first I've had in capsule form, it isn't much smaller than most others but it goes down like a baby aspirin. I think the Turmeric gives it a more pleasant taste ( I suppose it should be after-taste since it isn't in ones mouth very long). The fact that you only need to take it twice a day instead of three or four is fantastic and it seems to work just as good. On the down side; and this isn't brand specific, I do wish the cost of producing this would come down enough to make the price lower, however, the price for the VitaBreeze brand is a lot better than most. Now, if they'd just make these in an affordable gummie, that's in a large enough bottle one wouldn't have to purchase a new bottle before the month is out.

title: Have my life back!
body: Okay, I've never written a product review before but since this supplement has changed my life I feel I need to tell everyone.  I also know that different things work for different people so don't give up trying to find what works for you.  Over a year ago I tore the meniscus in my left knee. It was a small tear but painful. I developed a baker's cyst and long story short, the cyst ruptured and I ended up in ER unable to put any weight on that leg.  I was sent to an orthopedic surgeon diagnosed the cyst, the tear and mild arthritis.  He gave me a shot of cortisone and got me mobile again.  I was out of state so the goal was to get me home.  I left his office with no instructions to get into physical therapy when I returned home to rebuild strength and mobility so I stayed off it as much as possible. Little did I know that was only making things worse.  Three weeks later I was back in agony so ended up seeing another surgeon who sent me to PT for several months.  I got back on my feet but still had much stiffness and pain with limited mobility.  Then just as I was moving back to health, I fell and injured my other knee.  So I was back to square one but now with both knees.  I was not ready for surgery emotionally or physically.  My physical therapist recommended glucosamine and collagen in addition to PT, so I started researching and learned about the importance of using glucosamine along with Hyaluronic Acid.  After trying several very expensive and ineffective products I found myself reading the reviews of Joint Glucosamine Chondroitin MSM complex.  I read them all and because of the many testimonials I decided to try.  Several reviewers had said to give the supplement 3 weeks to work.  I was in such misery I honestly thought I would have to suffer the rest of my life, but at around 2 weeks I noticed a remarkable difference - ease at getting up and down, no pain when walking. At three weeks I had no pain and much less stiffness. Now at over 3 months of using this product, I am still pain free.  I am even doing stairs again.  I know it's important to keep moving and now with JGC MSM I can!

title: Significant Other in Tears due to Increased Mobility
body: I'm not one to take supplements.  One year ago, I saw a physician for hip problems.  We were talking about hip surgery and I began resigning myself to the idea of increasing limited mobility. I went through over the counter pain relief medication quicker than I have ever in my whole life; this had me worried.  I had difficulty climbing ten steps and the pain and limitations seemed to be increasing.  I started losing weight (I've lost 12 lbs. and have 40 lbs. to go) and started walking at first short distances (less than 10 minutes a day).  Then, I started these supplements about 08/2016.  Now, I'm up to walking 15 minutes in the morning, 15 minutes at night and sometimes I've walked 1 to 1.5 miles during the evening!  What a recovery.  My significant other was in tears the other night has we walked along the beach, which I couldn't do a year ago because of the shifting sand under my feet, which caused me to feel unstable.  Maybe it's the combination of exercise, weight loss and these supplements?  In any case, I'll be starting my 2nd bottle as soon as they arrive (made the first purchase in 08/2016 and took them on a semi-regular basis).  Whatever the cause of this recovery, I'm not at present considering hip surgery and my significant other and children have noticed quite an improvement.

title: Helps with my joints
body: I have read that glucosamine and chondroitin are ingredients that occur naturally in and around the cartilage of the joints.  And that the glucosamine in your body helps to keep your cartilage healthy. However, as you get older, your levels of this compound begin to drop, which can lead to the gradual breakdown of the joint. In my family we are very physically active and my older relatives have had a lot of knee cartilage issues as well as arthritis in other joints in the body. As I am getting older, I recognize that my body won't heal itself as quickly and I've used Glucosamine/Chondroitin on and off for years. I am of the opinion that my joints will benefit more from a preventative use of this product than if I waited until I had no cartilage left in my knees.  I have read that if you still have cartilage that this product can help to rebuild new cartilage, however if your knees are bone on bone (like my mother) you cannot rebuild cartilage and so this product is far less effective.  When I suggest this product to my mother, she does find it helps slightly, however with bone on bone she inevitably gets water on the knee, inflammation and a slew of issues that even this product cannot resolve.  I on the other hand experience the occasional knee pain, from skiing moguls or running hills and find that this product helps to keep my knees feeling pain-free and hopefully helping to keep my cartilage strong yet rubbery.

title: Zenwise Health - Joint Support Supplement - Complex with 1500mg Glucosamine, 1200mg Chondroitin, 1000mg MSM & Hyaluronic Acid
body: I need to have both knees replaced. However, I am a little to heavy to have the operation done safely, just yet. I am working on losing the extra pounds, but in the meantime I have to put up with bone grinding on bone pain. Until I can have the operation, this joint supplement helps keep the pain in my knees tolerable. As a former distance runner, I was very familiar with using DMSO to relieve bone pain when confronted with irritation caused by bones grinding together. When I discovered the similarities between MSM and DMSO, I HAD to try it to see if it worked. It does. It is not a miracle cure for the cartilage missing from my knees, but it does help keep things tolerable. The fact that this product has MSM combined with the ever popular glucosamine and chondroitin combination that has become a staple for arthritis sufferers everywhere, is a huge plus in my book. I give this product a great big two thumbs up.

title: 180 tablets" This product is amazing. Because of severe lower back problems
body: "With 1500mg Glucosamine, 1200mg Chondroitin, MSM & Hyaluronic Acid, 180 tablets" This product is amazing.  Because of severe lower back problems,  I was having difficulty walking very far without having to stop and rest every few minutes.  I didn't dare go very far for fear I wouldn't make it back.  My walk consisted of about four blocks.  After a few weeks, I was able to add three more blocks to my walks with much less stops and I was walking faster!  I don't expect miracles and know it will take time and my goal is to eventually walk more than a mile each way.  Zenwise labs customer service is wonderful and they even sent me a free bottle if I pledged to continue purchasing this product which I gladly will (along with their Krill OIl).  The cost of these two products is much lower than anything one can purchase at a drug store.

title: I'd give it more stars if I could!
body: IMHO, this is hands down the best and most complete supplement out there for joint support. It's improved my joint health overall, and having both bursitis and Fibromyalgia, I need all the help I can get. I can move better, my pain has decreased overall and I just plain feel better. It contains all the key ingredients that keep joints lubricated as well as reduces inflammation. It's been a miracle product for me and I can't sing it's praises loud enough. It's also NSF and GMP certified which is hard to find in supplements today. If your suffering from any form of inflammation and joint pain and stiffness, give this product a try. I don't think you'll be disappointed!

title: Helps with arthritis in the fingers.
body: I am about 5'10" and 160 lbs and I take 2 a day to ease the arthritis in my fingers. Even though the recommended dose is 3 a day I found little difference in taking 2 vs 3 so I am now sticking to two a day; one a day helped a little, two is perfect.  I am 35 and recently started feeling the effects of arthritis in my fingers, probably from jiu jitsu or video games, who knows.  I tried a week not taking it, after weeks of taking it, and noticed a difference.  Unfortunately, this might be one of those supplements I end up taking forever due to age; better than medication I guess.

title: This Stuff is the Real Deal
body: Excellent product.  At 59 I thought my knees were through in the summer of 2015.  Stairs were hurtful.  Well anyway after taking these pills as recommended for 3 weeks, pain was 99% gone.  I stopped taking the pills twice (because my knee felt great) and both times within 3 weeks my knees were back to aching.  1 Bottle will last about 2 months and my safe you money on doctor bills.

title: Zenwise Health, Joint Support
body: This is one of the best joint support supplements I have ever taken.  I'm 76 and have had lower back pain for years.  I have tried many supplements for this condition but I finally found the winner.  It has the typical Glucosamine and Chondroitin but in addition you get MSM, Boswellia, Curcumin and Hyaluronic Acid. Apparently it is this combination of ingredients that makes this so much better than the others I've tried. This is now my second bottle and plan on taking it forever barring any change in components.

title: Helped my joint pain
body: All I can say is: I was having constant pain in my hips no matter what I was doing--walking or sitting or lying down. I started taking this on March 22, and the pain abated within two weeks! Coincidence or the supplement? Who can say for certain? All I know is that since taking at the recommended dosage of three caplets a day, my hips are much more comfortable. I will certainly buy this product again and I recommend it. BTW, I also have some knee and foot pain, and those joints are less painful as well.

title: Pretty sure it works, but how can you really know

I injured soft tissue in my knee and i stopped taking vitamins and it took a long time to healbut when i started takimg them again, i found it to hurt less and seemed to heal at a faster rate. So I'm gonna keep taking them!

title: 2 months- not much difference....
body: I am an aging athlete and my knees kill me every single day!  I went to a surgeon who told me that that only solution was to get knee replacements, but that I was far too young (51) and way too active.  He said I'd wear the new knees out in a few years with the level of activity that I engage in and instead, he said I should lose 30 pounds (probably a good idea) and be proactive with treatment, meaning that I should ice the knees often, stretch more, and do more low impact activity.  He also said I should get serious about my diet and eat like a vegan and take some kind of Joint Support.  So, I'm doing all he said.  My weight is down to 205 (from 225) and I've been taking this supplement for 2 months now.  I can't say with 100% certainty that it is helping my knee pain. I really can't.  I emailed the company and they suggested that I take 2 in the morning and 1 at night.  I usually exercise in the morning, and every day, without fail, my knees absolutely ache- but I plow through it and am hoping that when my weight is down to 185 that I'll at least be in less pain.  So do they help?  I don't notice any difference after I take them or before.  My knees always ache.  But with all due respect, maybe my knees are at the level that even this product can't help!  The company told me that I could take this product long term, but that some people build up an immunity or resistance to it, so I was planning on discontinuing it when I get to 185 pounds and then to see if I actually notice anything.  I'm going to commit up to that point for sure.  Everything I've read says that this kind of stuff really helps, but I just can't in all honesty say that I notice much if any difference.

title: Astaxanthin 12mg from GreenWise
body: This higher dose Astaxanthin really makes a difference in my perception of well-being.  I had taken the 4mg dosage from another manufacturer for about a year before I tried this product.  After a month with the product, I sensed a marked, positive difference in how I felt - all other factors being equal.  My eyesight appears to be sharper and my mental acuity improved.  I will continue taking this product from GreenWise in light of the obvious benefits provided.

title: I have been taking Astaxanthin for awhile now and I ...

title: A Quality Supplement That Doesn't Break the Bank
body: I'm not sure where I read or heard it, but it was recommended that the effective dose of astaxanthin is 12mg.  That being said, it was difficult finding a quality supplement that didn't break the bank, considering that I would continue to consume it indefinitely.  So, I chose ZenWise Labs based on the fact that most astaxanthin vendors use the same source and that their price met my expectation on how much I wanted to spend.  In terms of how the supplement has affected me -- I feel that it's delivered on its promise.  I feel it's affected my mood (stabilized), my thinking process (focus) and my comprehension (clarity).  It could all be a placebo, or something else has created the positive change, but I feel it is the astaxanthin.  I'm sort of reluctant to take a week or so off just to test my hypothesis because I feel the supplement has provided an effective benefit that I don't want to build back up to.  The pills are small and easy to swallow, too.

title: Helped relieve my joint pain
body: I have been taking this for several years now and it's amazing. I no longer have any hip joint pains. I had bursitis in my hip at an early age and as I grew older it started hurting again. A friend recommended this product and within a month the pain was gone and it has never recurred. That was about 10 years ago. After I took the recommended dose for a few months, I cut back to 1 per day and that is still what I take. I had no side effects from it but my husband had stomach issues and switched to just Glucosamine and it is helping him with knee pain. This brand is what I always buy as it was the first I tried that did so well.

title: Glucosamine/Chondroitin, Triple Strength ..... it works
body: Not all versions are equal, this one works for me. I was introduced to Glu/Chon by my pharmacist friend. I was experiencing pain in the shoulder which was joint related. Wake me up in the middle of the night if I rolled over. On faith of a friend, I took this for 30 days without measuring anything. At the end of that test, I recall I had not woke with pain in an unknown number of nights. It either works or I believe it works. Either way, it works. I tried other brands and some work better than others, in fact, some don't work at all or not enough to keep the pain from coming back....BTW It takes about 30 days to be sure you are going to get an effect, but only about seven days if you quit taking it or get a brand that is not as good. Main good about triple vs double is you take less pills a day. mox nix.

title: so I'm sad that I am force to be so careful which ...
body: This is one of the few brands of Glucosamine / Chondroitin that does not contain a source of Bromine, as far as I can tell.  Many of the ones on the shelf in my local pharmacies contain bromate relate ingredients, as some people consider bromine to be a bone and connective tissue healing nutrient.  When I purchase this stuff, I am after Chondroitin, and do not want a single drop of bromine in my body.  I avoid Mountain Dew because of the Brominated Vegetable Oil, so why would I want to eat bromine in the form of a supplement?  When I started taking Glucosamine / Chondroitin supplements, bromine wasn't a common ingredient, so I'm sad that I am force to be so careful which one I buy, and this happens to be the brand I choose to buy.  Five stars for having additives I don't mind as much as the ones in the store.
