title: No more pain
body: I have never made a review on anything in my life, but I felt the need to share this.

title: The Only thing that helps my knee.
body: I have developed issues with one of my knees.  It aches. It cracks, it pops.  However, within a few days of taking the Osteo bi-flex I experienced marked improvement.  I always can tell when I have forgotten to take it a day or two because my knee starts to creak and ache again.  Really nothing else helps as well as this product does.  It is now a daily essential for me.  It is a bit more expensive then some other supplements on the market, but it is worth it......there is a definite difference in results.

title: Absolutely a miracle!
body: I had been taking another brand of glucosamine/MSM for many months and did not feel as if I was improving.  My right knee still hurt; both knees still "popped" when I walked, and I was still waking up in the middle of the night with lower back pain.  I have a host of chronic illnesses - including MS, Fibromyalgia, and lupus.  After FOUR days of taking this supplement, both my knees stopped popping, my right knee felt so great I walked on the treadmill for 30 minutes - and had NO PAIN!  I slept through the night, and my lower back does not hurt!  Like I said - Absolutely A Miracle!

title: Worked for me!
body: I read many of the reviews of this before ordering. My main problem was waking up with stiff fingers. My middle finger on my right hand would pop and hurt so bad. After 5 days all the stiffness in my fingers was gone except the right middle finger, but it was much better. This morning, day 7, even it wasn't hurting. Sure hope it stays that way. I would highly recommend after just one week.

title: Be Careful - this can cause acid indigestion and cramps
body: Be careful - this can cause gastro distress and acid indigestion.  Boswellia serrate, one of the ingredients in this product is known to cause problems with digestion.  I read other reviews mentioning people with GERD should not use but since I don't have that, I didn't think it would be a problem and I wanted something that would improve my joint paint.  This did not improve my joint pain and I started having stomach cramps and acid indigestion.  It took me a few days to 'connect the dots' and I finally remembered the review I read.  I stopped taking this and the cramps and indigestion ended the next day.

title: Ahhhh! Relief
body: At almost 50, things are beginning to wear out, specifically one knee more than the other.  My neck also sounded like it had gravel in it.  (When I asked my doc about the crunching sound when I turned my head, he reminded me I am almost 50).  After hearing all the rage about guclosamine- even Jack Hannah recommending it for dogs- I thought I'd give it a try.  Wow!  After about two weeks, my knees felt the same- like the good one!  No more crunching sounds when I turn my head either.  Amazon has the best price and with Prime- it was at the door sooner than I could drag myself to MalWart.  I love this stuff.  Give it a go and see for yourself!

title: shoulders and a bad knee I figured I would give it a try
body: I really thought using this product was a farce but with severe arthritis in my neck, shoulders and a bad knee  I figured I would give it a try.  I have been using now faithfully for two weeks and even though I am not painless I am moving much better and the arthritis is much easier to handle.  I definitely would recommend this product.

title: It really does work
body: I am a nurse that works in an Orthopedic surgery center. I hear most of my patient's talk about the benefits of taking Glucosamine-chondroitin, so I thought I would give it a try for my achy hip and knee. These pills are huge & difficult to swallow, but after several days of taking 2 at a time every day, my joints did not ache. I stopped taking them, thinking I was cured & a few days later, the ache started back. I barely need to take any NSAIDS now. My hip, knees and kidneys thank you.

title: Good but the jury is still out
body: I bought these cause my Doctor recommended them (not the brand but the Glucosamine Chondroitin) and  I have problems with my legs and wanted a more natural relief than narcotics. I imagine that since it "renews cartilage & lubricates joints" that you may have to take them a while before it promotes some kind of relief (they even say this on the label in one way or another) and I have only been taking them for 2 months so the jury is still out on whether they work effectively or not.  But I can say that i do take LESS aspirin than i used to and my joints dont seem to be as stiff for as long as they used to.

title: Be Careful - this can cause acid indigestion and cramps
body: Be careful - this can cause gastro distress and acid indigestion.  Boswellia serrate, one of the ingredients in this product is known to cause problems with digestion.  I read other reviews mentioning people with GERD should not use but since I don't have that, I didn't think it would be a problem and I wanted something that would improve my joint paint.  This did not improve my joint pain and I started having stomach cramps and acid indigestion.  It took me a few days to 'connect the dots' and I finally remembered the review I read.  I stopped taking this and the cramps and indigestion ended the next day.

title: Strongly recommended for people with joints problems
body: The best product for people who are suffering of joints problems. I personally underwent 4 knee surgeries and this product made miracles in my knee.

title: works wonders for my knee, but one of the side effects is headache......
body: The pain in my knee which I have had for more than a year due to an injury I sustained after thinking I could work out like I was 20 years old again (and probably due to wearing heels that were too high and being overweight) was gone on the same day after I took two OBF pills that morning. The problem? I now have a very irritating constant headache in my head and neck - if you research this product, that is one of the side effects. I will keep taking them to keep my knee working, and now I will take pills for my headache. UPDATE: If I only take one instead of the recommended 2, I have not had a headache with that decreased dosage.

title: My husband who has bad ankles says that he can tell the difference when ...
body: I really didn't notice any difference with my joints after taking this for a month.  I tend to get some achy knees on and off - it's the family curse.

title: Best quality at a great price...
body: I have been using this preventatively (or a generic version) for over 6 years for my Bull Mastiff. The breed is genetically known to be prone to hip problems, especially hip dysphagia. No matter what manufacturers say, generic is not equivalent to the Brand. I don't know if using it since she was 2, or if she just has no hip problems, but my big bear of a baby is doing great. She does sometimes over-do playing and swimming, causing a bit of leg pain, front and/or back, but an extra dose of Osteo Bi-Flex has her moving pain-free again in no time. Great price too. You can imagine how expensive it gets but as long as this seller doesn't raise the price I'll be buying from them for now on, saving me around $140 a year.

title: Not what's pictured.
body: What I received was not what was pictured. The ingredients are different. What was sent to me was the newer version of the product & that isn't what I was looking for. I only ordered it because I thought it was the original version of the product. The  picture needs to be changed since this is deceptive. I was disappointed. I didn't return it because it's close to the what I need & the price was better than in the stores. (Stores in my area only have the newer version now.) I've had extremely good results with the original product & I'm hoping that the small change in the ingredients won't change that. I've been using the original product for more than 10 years.

title: I started taking this while i was lifting, and ...
body: I started taking this while i was lifting, and stupidly stopped thinking I didn't need it. OMG night and day! this totally makes a difference if your having point discomfort! I normally take it (2x a day) for a few weeks and let it build up, then i decrease to one a day for a few months. Then when i start having joint pain will go back to two.

title: Great for dogs as well as people
body: When my getting-on-in-age Boston Terrier's mobility declined rapidly, I thought I'd have to put him down. My vet urged me to get a glucosamine/chondroitin supplement, which I'd always thought was a scam. A client in her lobby, overhearing our conversation, told me that it had made all the difference in the world with his dog. So... I bought Osteo Bi-flex, & started giving my dog 1 pill per day. Within a month, my dog had regained all of his previous mobility, & more.

title: My knees used to sound like Rice Krispees when I would ascend stairs
body: My knees used to sound like Rice Krispees when I would ascend stairs, due to years and years of weightbearing squats and lunges at the gym. Now my knees are like silent ninjas. Good product.

I've been taking it for two weeks and after one week was amazed at the difference this has made!  I still have a little achiness but NOTHING like it was before.  I will keep taking this as long as it helps which I have a feeling it will based on the reviews here.  Try it a bottle of this...what do you have to lose except your pain??

title: Received the wrong item
body: This review is not about this specific item but a warning before you order. I received another Osteo Bi-Flex product with only 375 mg of Chondroitin Complex, not the 1288 mg that this product contains. I'm having some knee pain again, so it may be that the I'm missing the chondroitin effect. This happened before when I ordered an Osteo Bi-Flex product on Amazon, so beware. I should have returned the substitute item instead of giving it a chance.

title: Pay for 120 caps and get 80?????
body: I bought this for my mom who lives in Brazil last month. I ordered to be delivered in my friends house that was going there on vacation. For my surprise, she told me that it was delivered the 80 capsules one and not the 120 capsules one the I bought. I know that this is a very unusual thing and I never had that kind of problem before. But I'm still very upset about it!!

title: Ugh! Way too big to swallow!
body: Like several others who have written, these caplets are WAY TOO BIG to swallow. I normally don't have problems swallowing pills, so when one of these got stuck in my throat it was an experience that I didn't want to repeat. I contacted the company via Twitter about it, and their "advice" was to crush them before taking. Well tried that but the pill then just becomes chards...ever tried to swallow chards? Another unpleasant experience! After taking 40 or so this way I've decided it's just not worth it. Am going back to my previous supplement which comes in capsule form and gives me about the same amount of relief for my knees --- in a much easier to swallow version!!!

title: Strongly recommended for people with joints problems
body: The best product for people who are suffering of joints problems. I personally underwent 4 knee surgeries and this product made miracles in my knee.

title: I love Tumeric. Unfortunately
body: I love Tumeric. Unfortunately, I didn't get to enjoy it because UPS decided to open my package and bottles. I will not order vitamins or anything to ingest from Amazon because I have had too many instances of UPS vandalising my packages.

title: Works for me
body: I'm told that this product does not work for everybody.  I started using it only after going to the bone doctor for steroid shots.  I had one knee done that I thought was the worst, and waited (no insurance) on the other.  On the way out the nurse suggested I try this stuff.  I bought a bottle and started taking one in the morning and one at night.  The knee that had the shots was better right away, but to my surprise, the knee I was waiting on got better too!  I know of no other reason than I started taking Bi-Flex.  I tried a cheaper brand and my knees started to hurt again.  Back on this product and my knees are fine.  Take it for what it's worth.

title: Works!
body: I ordered this for my mom to try. She had been experiencing pain for some time now, I can't really explain what the problem is because she's pretty quiet about it but she has mentioned having trouble getting out of bed in the morning due to ache's in her knees. Arthritis is common in my family though, with her sisters all having it so that might be her case as well. SO FAR she has been taking it for a few months and she says they're helping her A LOT. She started buying them at her local Costco though because they're cheaper there.

title: Amazing!
body: Five months ago I received a bone scan that revealed my hip joints had degenerated due to my juvenile rheumatoid arthritis. I'd been taking a pain killer ever since for my hip pain. I tried THIS product and I can only attest to the fact I am no longer on pain killers. With just two of these tablets per day. That should say it all.

title: Astonishing results
body: I recently went back to taking Glucosamine/Chondroitin/MSM because of severe arthritic pain in my left knee that suddenly emerged. (I had stopped taking it about a year ago because of a major study that showed that Glucosamine/Chondroitin/MCM was not effective, but have since learned that this study was funded by Celebrex...anyway, that is another story.)

title: Helped eliminate pain from torn meniscus on knee!
body: I tore my meniscus in my right knee, and my ortho doc told me it was too minor to operate on. He recommended I take Osteo Bi-Flex to ease my nagging pain. I started to use this product  and my knee has felt much better. You take two tablets daily. My knee no longer bothers me, but I make sure I take these tablets every day. Hope they help your knee or joint pain!

title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
body: This product takes about 2-3 weeks to kick in. I was taking 2 pills every morning, and within the 3rd week, my knee pain, thumb pain, and someof my back pain started to go away! IT was always difficult for me to kneel down to pick something up and then stand back up. First of all my knee would kill me to bend when I knelt, and then to stand back up it hurt and was just not strong enough to help me, so I would have to use a counter or something to help me up. After a month of taking this product, I can literally do squats with my knee and there is only a slight pain, nothing like it was before. I HIGHLY recommend this product.

title: Good product, even better price
body: I've used this product for awhile and feel it makes a real difference for me. I can tell when I haven't been taking it. But the price can be a little high, and this deal from Amazon is the best I've found pricewise. I also like having a large enough supply on hand to last 2-3 months. The only drawback is the size of the pills, but that's the same for all of these joint meds.

title: Great for bad knee - But beware side effects
body: I have been using Osteo Bi-Flex now for 2 or 3 months, sadly over a month ago I noticed I started getting a mild headache every day. Lately my headaches have been getting very bad, I also started feeling like I had a mild case of the flu every day, complete with a low-grade fever.

title: Always been good to me
body: Hard to go wrong with this purchase! Cheaper than cvs or walgreens and if you work out at all and are over thirty, you will notice the difference. No more silly pain or soreness or clicking. It's not a healer, although it surely helps, but it's a great idea to take it. Works for me and I walk up stairs and cycle and I am 50+!

title: Works wonders and super economical...for the dog!
body: ...I'm sure it's great for people too! ;) I bought it for my arthritic dog. There are so many different doggy joint supplements out there, it's quite hard to choose. Really, the most important ingredients for a canine joint supplement are Glucosamine and chondroitin, which Osteo Bi-flex has. At first I had the pup on some chewy supplements that the vet recommended that cost $150 for a six month supply and though I gave them daily I didn't see much improvement.

title: Good product, great price
body: I have been taking glucosamine/chondroitin for almost one year now and have tried a couple of brands. To be honest, I don't see much of a difference between the brands (as long as the dosages remain the same). What I do like about this product is that I have to take only 2 pills a day, instead of 3 with most of the other similar products, and the pills are not huge (at least no more than the other 3-pills-a-day products. Moreover, the price is great. I know you can get 1-pill-a-day products out there, but the price difference do not justify it in my opinion. Regarding the supplements (glucosamine/chondroitin) themselves, it takes a good while to fell the effects (> 3 months) and they are definitely noting like a miracle, but it does help a lot. So far, it is the most affordable solution for the joint pain.

title: Top of the Line
body: Been using this brand for over 20 years now. Best on the market for us.

title: Great price
body: I pay the same price for 80 of these at my local discount store, so 120 makes it a bargain.  This product does seem to make a difference in my knee and back pain because if I stop taking them the pain gets worse.  So why not take them?  However, I do see lots of recommendations for other joint pain products, but hate to take the chance, so I'll stick with these.

title: Works wonders
body: I have what they call runners knee and I have been in constant pain since I stop playing in high school. My orthopedic doctor gives me these painful shots in my knee every 3 months for about a year and I had enough because the pain would come back in less then 2 weeks, I was browsing through amazon looking for a more natural based product for joint pain and I purchased it and this has done wonders for. In as little as 4 days my knee pain was completely GONE! and I thank God for this and would recommend anyone with runners knee syndrome or any kind of joint pain to try it. I went 3 weeks without using this product and the pain was still diminished. To maintain this feeling I only take one capsule every other night.

title: Good for elderly
body: I tried a very good medicine for knees and neck disease, but the pills were very big, in this case those pills have a good size for elderly and the ingredients seems to be effective for my relatives (elderly people) that has wastage of cartilage, it works and the pain they suffered has disappeared.

title: Very Effective Product
body: Today I got two bottles of Osteo Bi-Flex from Amazon. 2-day Prime Shipping is THE BEST!! This product is also THE BEST!!

title: Love this stuff...
body: I've been using Osteo Bi-Flex for a while and it has always helped my joints feel great.  I've been in the Army for 7 years and I go to the gym often (besides military PT) and taking this daily has helped with elbow and knee issues that have developed as a result of a lot of physical activity.  I highly recommend it.

title: Great price and benefit for your health
body: Value price for over the counter health care product!

title: Osteo Arthritis Knee Pain Gone!
body: I have osteo arthritis that affects almost all the joints in my body. The Osteo Bi-Flex took the knee pain away with in a week of starting it. I used it previously for a couple of months and when I stopped taking it my knee pain returned. I started taking it again, no knee pain! I will continue to take it from here on out! Amazon subscribe & save has the best price!  I have a bottle shipped to my house every 2 months!

title: Ahhhh! Relief
body: At almost 50, things are beginning to wear out, specifically one knee more than the other.  My neck also sounded like it had gravel in it. After hearing all the rage about guclosamine- even Jack Hannah recommending it for dogs- I thought I'd give it a try.  Wow!  After about two weeks, my knees felt the same- like the good one!  No more crunching sounds when I turn my head either.  Amazon has the best price and with Prime- it was at the door sooner than I could drag myself to MalWart.  I love this stuff.  Give it a go and see for yourself!

I have been on the stuff right at a week, but the pain and stiffness immediately starting going away day 1! A week later just a little stiff but no pain! I hope it gets better because I am going to use this opportunity to lose weight and really slow down the progress of arthritis!

title: It really does work

These pills are huge & difficult to swallow, but after several days of taking 2 at a time every day, my joints did not ache. I stopped taking them, thinking I was cured & a few days later, the ache started back. I barely need to take any NSAIDS now. My hip, knees and kidneys thank you.

body: This stuff is amazing. Nothing else has worked on my creaky knees. I have Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome along with some arthritis (I'm only 29! And yes, the pills are HUGE. I've gagged on them multiple times. But I will keep taking them damn it! It's got to be better for me than a constant mix of ibuprofen and Tylenol, right?

title: Osteo Bi-flex triple strength
body: I am rather disappointed with the taste and appearance of this product; the pills are large, powdery and taste dusty. When I take them with liquid I can still taste them hours after. I'd give them 1star for that. After lots of experimenting I now take them with food which seems to be the solution to the after taste. I do have one BIG plus though; they really provide comfort within a week! This is why they get 4stars, I wish they would make the triple strength pills like the double strength pills, which are gel caps.

title: capsules too large

title: The Store Brand may be Better

title: Osteo Bi-Flex
body: Osteo Bi-Flex does work. I've been taking it for a while and it seems to help with my knee pain.

title: The taste and size...no thank you!
body: I decided to start taking this supplement after finding out that at 27 I'm in the beginning phases of arthritis. The taste of these pills is terrible. There's no coating at all, and I can understand for diabetics not having a sugar based coating, but ick! I have to summon the courage every day to attempt to take these supplements. And I'm also not one who can't swallow pills easily, but these pills are huge! I would imagine that those who do not take pills/medication easily will have a difficult time taking these on a daily basis.

title: Wondeful stuff! But you MUST take it on a full stomach!
body: This is wonderful stuff! I suffer from arthritis due to carpal tunnel release surgery and now, reoccurring carpal tunnel syndrome and since I refuse to stop using my hands, I decided to search for an alternative to another surgery and this worked perfect. And the fact that a friend recommended it, saying it was amazing. I would have rated this a 5 star but I left 1 star off due to the following: You have to take it on a FULL stomach, the pill is very large and it leaves a tremendous after taste in your mouth after swallowing.  I personally got sicker than a dog one day when I didn't take it on a completely full stomach which is more than a morning bagel does for you and found myself putting off taking the pill. And since I take all my meds first thing in the morning, I found myself forgetting to take it since I knew what would happen if I took it on an empty stomach.  You would think I would just change my meds schedule to afternoon but many of my meds require taking it in the morning. In a perfect world, this pill would be made in a smaller form, without the after taste and to be able to take it without having to have a full meal on my stomach.  These are small things though compared to the improvement you will feel if you take it on a daily basis (after a meal).

title: Expensive, but it works.
body: Injured my right knee stumbling in a hole while training for our twice yearly military physical readiness training (PRT) on Jan 12, 2009. My knee went downhill from there and by 2011, there would be no more running and the PRT became an elliptical or bicycle event for me as the right knee was excruciating.  Needed a cane at the worst of the pain and was told to never run again, which is depressing as running was a major antidepressant for me.  I had a love/hate relationship with running, but when you are told to stop running or have a knee replacement, it's a live changing event.  I tried multiple forms of glucosamine and chondroitin without any relief until finding Osteo Bi-Flex Triple Strength.  Amazing how fast it worked on my arthritic, crappy knee.  I continue to take one tablet (and they are a bit large), twice a day.  My knee no longer hurts constantly.  They are expensive, but this one works, so I will keep using them so I can continue to hike, walk my dogs, garden, and occasionally jog out of the way of fast cars/trucks while crossing the street.

title: Osteo Bi-Flex & it's beneficial effects
body: For me, this is a most beneficial product.  Within 3 days it eliminated knee joint pain.  I have had both knees operated on (medial meniscus tears) and they had been doing very well, but suddenly I was getting some pain.  My pharmacist recommended this product, when asked and it worked faster than the label stated it might.  Always a good surprise.  Sundown has always made a superior product, no matter what I have used over the years, so I highly recommend this to anyone who is suffering minor joint pain as a possible solution.

title: Is it worth the hype?
body: I tried Osteo Bi-flex advanced triple strength on the recommendation of several friends.  I have been having a lot of problems with joint pain, especially in my hips.  Unfortunately, I wasn't able to take this supplement for longer than a week because I was experiencing almost migraine-like headaches when I took the supplement.  Haven't seen any mention of headaches as a side effect from Osteo Bi-flex, so I just could be having some weird reaction to it. Did not seem to help my joint pain in the short duration.

title: I have a mild case of GERD
body: After having read so many positive reviews on Amazon, I decided to try Osteo Bi-flex for my arthritic knee. I had read about the possible abdominal side-effects but as my GERD is deemed to be a mild case, I decided to chance it. After about 10 days of ingesting the pills I began to feel some abdominal cramping but I did not make the connection. Two days later I was suffering from severe abdominal cramps and diarrhea. I googled possible side-effects of the supplement and my symptoms were listed. Sorry that it did not work out well for me.

title: Better ways to spend your supplement dollars
body: I have used this twice for two years  each time.  I have come to the conclusion that it is useless.  My husband has been a faithful user for over 8 years.  I finally talked him into stop wasting our money for this supplement.  It is very expensive.  You can use your money for better supplements.  A couple of suggestions would be - turmeric (you can make your own capsules with organic turmeric and black pepper).  My favorite would be astaxanthin which not only protects your joint and tendon health but also supports - eyes, skin from sun exposure, anti aging thru cellular health, immune system, cardiovascular health and also aids in recovery from exercise.  I can work in the garden on a sunny day for over 2 hours and no burn whatsoever.  That's where you should put your money.

title: Aching Knees Gone
body: I am on my 4th bottle of Natrol MSM and Glucosamine. Every evening I take one capsule. It works for me! No aching knees! I few times I thought, why am I still taking this, my knees don't ache, so I would stop. Within three weeks, I'd have aching knees again. I have learned my lesson. It does take awhile to build up to working status in your system, but once it does, it works! A big bonus for me is that these are capsules which go down well and not the size of horse pills.

title: Great for my dog
body: I use these for my dog as a safe cost efficient option instead of the ones marketed for dogs. I did my research and spoke to my vetrinarian and this was by far the best option for my dog's needs. Before using research your dog's dosage for safety.

title: These really work!
body: I purchased these for my father in law who just turned 79.  He was taking this regularly and because I forgot to reorder them, we ran out.  It was about a week later my father in law says to me that his joints are aching.  So I'm running through all sorts of things in my mind as to what it might be.  Then it hit me.  We ran out of his MSM & Glucosamine gelcaps.  Ding, ding, ding! Quickly, I reordered them and got him back on them.  So if there is any doubt, these things work!  Don't delay - get your bottle today!

title: Great Product, Good Price / And It Works
body: I have used Glucosamine, MSM and Condroitin for years to help with osteoarthritis. I stop taking it from time to time to see if it is still working. Within a couple of weeks, the pain starts to return and by week three I am ordering my meds. I started taking the condroitin in the morning and the Glucosamine and MSM in the evening after reading that they were much more effective when taken that way. I found it to be true. The Natrol works and the price is good. I can't think of a better testimony, unless your goal is to spend money on stuff that doesn't work or doesn't work well. I stick with what works for me, and this is it.

title: Worth trying for the anti-inflammatory action
body: In the last fifteen years, after almost a million dollars in medical bills, and seven major surgeries, my lumbar spine has (hopefully) been stabilized, with no further degeneration. My biggest problem now is pain from osteoarthritis in my spine. I've stopped taking NSAIDS because of my doctor's concern for my kidneys. So a few months ago, I started taking glucosamine and MSM, hoping the anti-inflammatory effects would help with the pain. The results aren't clear at this time, but I think that my pain levels have decreased slightly, and I attribute that to the glucosamine and/or MSM, in conjunction with physical therapy.

title: Use for achy joints and to bind lectins
body: Great supplement for aches and pains, but also binds up lectins if you are trying to reduce your intake of them. Great price and trusted brand as well.

title: Bought for my senior dog
body: I got these capsules to add to my aging dog's food to help him with his joints. While I can't say that they worked miracles, I like to think that this supplement helped him go down the stairs a bit easier. I figured for this price, it'd be worth a shot. I did appreciate that the capsules were easy enough to open- just a small twist and pull, and you're good to go.

title: I'm not happy about this whole transaction
body: BEWARE! Dosage is 2 pills 3 times per day with a meal.  That's 6 pills per day.  No thank you. There are other more convenient options available that don't require taking so many pills in one day.  Six pills per day is absurd in my opinion.  I wish the description would have made this clear before I bought it.  I tried to return it and Amazon Prime wants to charge me $6 for the shipping label.  I'm not happy about this whole transaction.

title: my American Pitbull Terrier loves this stuff.
body: I have a few APBT's and 2 of which are getting up there in age, one is 11 and the other is 15.  My 11yr old female is a huge rednose which has always weighed around 80# which is huge for a true apbt.  Well now in her older years she has been moving around much much slower and I can tell her front elbows have been sore.  I started her on this supplement about a month ago and I am giving her 3 to 4 a day.  I have noticed a huge difference in the way she is now acting (much happier and playfull) as she is now finally getting up and playing with the new puppy that we have.  My fiancée and I are so happy to see our big girl is doing so well now again.  This stuff truly works wonders and we cannot be more happy.  im sure this would also work for humans.. lol as what this is actually made for..

title: No longer skeptical
body: I was initially skeptical but after reading the reviews I decided to order this for my husband's joint pain as a result of his army careel and now rheumatoid arthritis. After about a month he says he can't feel a difference but I can see the difference. He's more active now and although he mentions his knee, elbow and back pain, he is no longer going to bed wrapped in ace packs!  I'm very pleased. He finally ran out and after 2 days without this, the third wheel -ice packs- have returned! I am ordering more abs next time I won't allow him to run out. Hope this helps guys. You wont be disappointed if you have chronic joint pain.

title: Easy-to-swallow Capsules
body: I've tried other supplements in tablet form, and they often got stuck in my throat.  These are in gelatin capsules, which are easy to handle but when one takes them with a little water they become slippery smooth to swallow without getting stuck.  As an added bonus, the capsules will digest more quickly as well.

After using this product for more than a year, we notice an improvement in our joints and flexibility.  We believe it is due to a combination of diet, exercise and this glucosamine formula.  Our 11 year old dog also showed signs of hip dysplasia, and after two months on this product, she is as frisky as a puppy.  Good stuff!

title: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION MISLEADING!
body: Though we are yet to test the product whether it works and improves the condition, we just realized one glaring issue -  The product description is not as advertised. The serving size is actually 4 pills a day (where is the triple strength!!) to make it the recommended 1500 mg of Glucosamine!!--most other Glucosamine Chondroitin MSM tablets have twice the dosage in 1 tablet (so 2 pills are enough). What more - the label says that "Servings Per Container" is 120 which is false!! This will remain only 60 servings per container, so this is ONLY a 60 day supply (from 240 tablets) and NOT 120!!! This just doubles your cost!

title: Great product for dogs with arthritis even though it is made for people
body: I researched lots of glucosamine products to find the best ingredients and the best price and this was the product I found to be best in both categories. I bought this product for my dog (he is a lab/ husky mix) after researching many glucosamine products, comparing the dosage to that of dog products. My vet said the ingredients were "perfect" . When I started him on it his arthritis was so bad that he couldn't walk at all, just barely able to relieve himself and could not go up or down steps without me practically lifting him. He could not get up from a laying position without help and his legs trembled when he was standing. This is not an exaggeration. He could only stand for a minute or so. When I took him to the vet  I  thought she was going to have him put to sleep. But she put him on aspirin, a pain killer, and glucosamine. The glucosamine was my idea but the vet said the ingredients in this particular brand were canine safe. I have been giving it to my 75 pound dog for four weeks. He no longer takes the pain killer. He is now able to get up and down entire flights of steps all by himself, can swim to retrieve balls and take walks. I can't say for sure that the glucosamine is the reason since he is still on aspirin as well but I think it must be helping and I plan to keep him on it permanently. I am hopeful that I can decrease the aspirin to a minimal dose and rely on the much healthier glucosamine. I am amazed at his improvement, to me it is miraculous. I am so grateful for this product. I have been recommending not it to all of my family members with arthritis. Unfortunately people can be more stubborn than dogs, because I bet this product would make a difference in their lives! Thank you Viva Labs

title: YES THIS WORKS LIKE A CHAMP!
body: Having never used a product of this type I am unable to compare to another - however, having suffered a Lvl3 sprained ankle and researching recovery strategies I found out about this combo of ingredients.

body: have been taking for a month now, originally vitamins being two to four months with price became reason for purchase being sometimes the top two brands arthritis association approve brand and digestive advantage three combination work wonderfully but locating all three can become hard to locate while purchasing at a fixed income price sew with longevity history would become unrealistic to name Viva superior to above two brands with such true statement however Viva for mine personal medical conditions best results for price range proof without eating any french vanilla pudding yesterday, did not take vitamins to test difference without taking vitamin result a minimum of two hours less of action accomplishing....thank you for pain relief when needing a less expensive price

title: !!! INCREDIBLE RELIEF !!!
body: It had been years since I took a Glucosamine, Chondroitin and MSM complex, so when I found myself aching in the middle of the night as well as during the day, I figured it was time to give it another! (I suffer from psoriatic arthritis but am not willing to risk the twenty-one-hundred possible side affects from Big Pharma) I chose this brand because I have purchased other things from Viva Naturals before and find they offer truly quality products.

title: ... has arthritis in both hands which is increasingly getting worse. Of course he never has time to go ...
body: My husband has arthritis in both hands which is increasingly getting worse.  Of course he never has time to go back to the specialist and has been managing the pain with Naproxen.

title: AMAZING and MUST TRY
body: I was having pain in my hips and down my left leg for months.  Doc said take Aleve at night so I did for months and it really didn't make much difference.  Went back to the doctor and xrays were done.  Found out I have arthritis in both hips and a degenerative disk in my back, hence the shooting pain down my leg.  She gave me a prescription for a muscle relaxer (forgot the name of it) and I started taking it and it helped some but not much.  I really didn't want to be on any prescription meds and I happened to be shopping at WalMart with my mom who said to try Glucosamine.  I bought a small bottle and it worked wonders so I purchased this one from Amazon.  Stuff is amazing!  The pain doesn't completely go away but it helps a LOT.  I've since told 3 friends and my husband who are all taking it and it's helping them like it did me.  I don't know that the Viva Labs is necessarily better than the one Costco sells, or anyone else sells, but the Glucosamine Chrondroitin works AMAZINGLY WELL.

title: If you have HBP, beware.
body: We have both been taking this and I believe it's good quality, but this particular type of Glucosamine is a salt, and I have struggled with high blood pressure since 2004, so my body did not like this salt format and my blood pressure was starting to creep up. There is cheaper glucosamine that isn't a salt and I may take that kind if I feel the need.  My husband it able to take the Viva Labs brand, and has reported an improvement in how his knees feel.  I suspect his kidneys work better than mine.  Anyway, something to be aware of if you struggle with edema or high blood pressure.

title: GLUCOSAMINE CHONDROITIN MSM Definitely Works!
body: DISCLAIMER: The reviewer has been compensated for offering an evaluation of the following product.

title: I cancelled my knee surgery because Viva Labs GC&M works!
body: Three days before surgery for the second meniscus repair on my left knee, I learned about Viva Labs Glucosamine Chondroitin with MSM. I had worn an unloader brace for 5 months yet the knee was no better.

title: I would buy it again
body: I take Glucosamine for a while now. My left knee is pretty damaged Osteoarthritis. :-(

title: Fantastic for Aging Body Parts
body: This is truly an amazing product. Purchased it for both my husband and myself both 74 years of age.  He had at one time broken his back in two places and later at two different times had broken each wrist.  Age was causing problems with these old injuries and he is more than pleased with the Viva triple strength Glucosamine as am I..  No major injures for me except multiple sprained ankles.  I also spent 39 years in employment that required being on you feet. This has helped both of us fell more energetic and less complaints from our various body part as we continue very active lives.  Will definitely continue using this product.

title: Try it.....
body: This is a great product for several reasons.  First of all it works as well or better than the big name brands.  Secondly and for me the most important, is that it is in capsule form rather than the large pill form of the better known brands.  They are much easier to swallow.  I will stay with these from now on.  I'm 71 years old and my husband is 66 and we both have arthritis issues and do not want to take pain meds.  I truly feel that this combination of ingredients works best for us and third, it costs less than the major brands.  Why wouldn't you like that?

title: Viva la Viva
body: I love Viva Labs because I have come to rely on their natural ingredients. Compared to other companies who put additives in their pills or use gelatin and other other things for the capsules, Viva is reliably all natural. I've been using their GCM for nearly a year now and it really does make a difference in the joints. I have discovered this particular item is available on the subscribe and save, which is an added savings bonus. As a consumer, I will always highly recommend Viva (unless they suddenly change their business practices and start using shoddy ingredients :-D).

title: It Works!
body: I was given a sample of this product a while ago and when I finished it I lost no time in ordering more! I take it with Boswellia, Turmeric and Ashwaganda. It has done a remarkable job if relieving me of the symptoms of osteoarthritis. It does this by reducing the inflammation and, with the addition of this product, actually rebuilding damaged cartilage. I am more mobile now than I have been for a very long time.  I might also add that I have tried a number of other brands over the years and this is the first one that does not upset my stomach!

title: spokeo
body: MISLEADING DESCRIPTION - The quantity of Glucosamine and Chondroitin of the capsules is one half that of the other brands.  This is not easily determined via the product description.  To get the advertised dosage of 1500 mg of Glocosamine, it is required to take FOUR (4) capsules.  This is in contrast to other products that offer 1500 mg of glucosamine in just two tablets.  You will require twice as many portions and therefore pay twice as much money for the same benefit.

title: 4 Caps versus 2
body: I had high hopes for this product, but see no difference. I have used similar products for a long time and some seemed to help to some degree, but these don't seem to help at all. The label is also misleading in that a "serving size" is two capsules and if you read closely you have to take 4 per day. It is advertised as "triple strength" but comparing these with name brands, those brands have more active ingredients per "serving" and require just two capsules or caplets per day. Not impressed.

title: Some noticeable pain relief
body: I have a degenerative spinal condition that has resulted in seven major surgeries in the past eleven years. Because of some issues with my kidneys, my doctor has asked me to discontinue taking any NSAIDs. With my back problems and arthritis coming on with old age, I go through a good bit of pain. I've been taking the Viva Labs glucosamine-chondroitin-MSM combination for several weeks, and it has made a positive difference. The amount of pain relief and increased mobility hasn't been huge, but it is noticeable, and I have to attribute that to the Viva Labs product.

title: NOT "triple" strength
body: Years ago when I read research related to Glucosamine Chondroitin with MSM it said you had to take the entire 1500mg at one time, to get the best results. This formula is half strength and directions say to take it twice a day.

title: They work well. Found this to be the best bargain here.
body: Very effective, no side effects.  These are large capsules.  Some might have difficulty swallowing them but, if so, just open them up and mix them with something.  The drugs are almost tasteless.  I have had cartilage removed from my knee and a bunionectomy.  I also suffer from osteoarthritis of my knees.  I found these very effective at easing my pain and increasing flexibility.  The glucosamine does NOT increase blood glucose levels.  Win-Win.  I found this to be the best bargain here on Amazon (when I bought) and far cheaper than Wal-Mart.

title: These capsules are definitley worth their price
body: I have arthritis in my fingers and the joints were always a little sore. Once I started using the Viva Glucosamine Chondroitin and MSM casules, 3 per day (usually all together at night, though that is NOT the preferred way!), the pain left. If I miss two days, the pain starts again. So, I rarely miss taking the capsules. Viva is the only brand I could find that has the GCM in capsule form - I cannot take the large tablets that are commonly available. IMO the Viva capsules are worth every cent I pay!

title: Really helping my aching rotator cuff!!
body: I have used these for about 2 months now and I  really like them, I have had a torn  rotator cuff and these help some with the pain as well as some exercise to keep it fluid! I just do not want surgery as I know of a friend of mine who had the rotator operated on and it really did not help! I will keep taking these and see in another month how I do. I'll come back and update then!

title: This is like my sixth bottle
body: This is like my sixth bottle. Was having knee and shoulder pain due to arthritis and worn cartilage. Started taking them last year while I was in physical therapy (2) two, twice a day as directed, I've had very little pain if any since. I believe this works well for me, but I think you have to give them a little time to work and take them religiously. A friend told me to take the MSM along with the Gloucosamine/Condroidin and I found this to have all three in one.

title: Noticeable Difference
body: I've done Crossfit for 4.5 years AFTER miniscus surgery.  got fed up with pain just picking simple stuff up off the floor which is a combination of soreness from XFIT as well as limited range of mobility.  started taking these supplements at the same time I started doing a daily 15 minute mobility wod (romwod) and after 3-4 weeks have noticed a complete turnaround.  kneeling down to tie my shoes or pick something up, even after a hard day, is easy.  can't say for certain if it's one thing, a combo, or just plain mental game - but I feel better than I have in years as far as my joints go!!!

title: I would highly recommend this product if you have joint problems such as ...
body: I would highly recommend this product if you have joint problems such as arthritis, tendonitis etc. Don't expect immediate relief as it may take two to three months with daily use but most certainly worth the trouble. I think that most will see an improvement if not a dramatic one, so please be patient and give yourself a chance to recover rather than merely masking the pain with chemical medications.

title: Glucosamine
body: They came on time. The packaging was secure.I decided to try these after using a different brand. They are not as concentrated as the ones I was taking. You have to take four a day instead of two. I just started taking these so I can say how good they are. The thing is that I don't know if these supplements work no matter what brand they are. I have chronic and very painful arthritis even though I am not very old. My pain levels fluctuate from day to day. I just figure that it is a wise thing to take these to help preserve my joints.

title: Stunned at just how much better my hip has been feeling
body: I have been taking this supplement twice a day (with breakfast and with dinner) at the recommendation of my doctor to help support cartilage in my hip after a running injury last year.  I had low expectations that a supplement would actually do anything that physical therapy couldn't do, but I am stunned at just how much better my hip has been feeling over the past couple of weeks which I attribute to this supplement.  There is definitely more ease of movement and less ache in general, and I will be continuing to use this product. Very satisfied and recommended to others!

title: A Good Choice!
body: I took the advise of my wife's hip replacement surgeon in 2009 and have been taking half the prescribed dose ever since.  I experimented a few times over the years by laying off the supplement entirely for several weeks, only to start feeling some aches and pain in my joints.  I had right frontal(new procedure) hip replacement in 2015, and all went "great".  I switched to Viva about two years ago because it works and is cheaper!

title: Love it!
body: I purchased these glucosamine capsules for my two large dogs who are getting older and have a harder time getting around. These are so easy because I can just open the capsule and add it to my dogs food instead of having to crush pills as I did previously. I also have to comment on Viva labs excellent customer service. I will continue to purchase this supplement through this company.

title: I have been using Glucosamine tablets for years to eliminate ...

I previously bought them locally for a similar price, but found that the tablets are typically very large and sometimes impossible to swallow.  These are also large, but are in capsules which are smoother and much easier to swallow.  As a big plus, after taking them for several weeks, my joint pain continues to be gone.

title: Martial Arts hurt my joints and this helped.
body: I am only 26 and years of martial arts have left my joints in my legs popping and cracking when I stand/kneel. While this may help once you have arthritis I have used it as a preventative method and to help repair the damage I have done. It has improved not just my knees in the couple months of me taking this, but also my finger joints (I work on a pc all day and this really did help with my hands!), my toes (too many kicks into wooden boards and heavy bags left them cracking EVER morning now... not so much), and even my neck. I will finish this bottle and be done for now, but I will definitely be coming back for another round of this every 10 years or so. I may update this review again after I have finished the bottle (I only take 1 in the morning since I do not have any real medical conditions requiring it) and I will report back if my joints degrade sharply afterwards etc. So far I have been hella happy and I DO recommend this. I did not receive any discounts like other reviewers are stating, but I'd also like to point out that there are many other trusted brand names out there. Don't buy junk and do your homework.

title: Great Supplement!

title: Gastric Bypass Patients take Note!
body: I highly recommend this product for anyone with malabsorbtion issues (Gastric Bypass patients, et al). It is a clear capsule with powdered ingredients and while it is a bit on the large size and you need to take 4 of them a day, it actually works. I'd been taking the standard tablet type for years on the advice of my doctor, but it didn't seem to be doing much good. After only two weeks of this version, the difference in my joints was astonishing. After a month, they felt great. Then I ran out as I'd forgotten to reorder and put off ordering more as I was using up the old tablet type made by another manufacturer. Big mistake. The aches and pains were back! I reordered the Viva Labs capsules and started taking them again, and a month later, the aches have subsided. It works. Period.

title: Martial Arts hurt my joints and this helped.
body: I am only 26 and years of martial arts have left my joints in my legs popping and cracking when I stand/kneel. While this may help once you have arthritis I have used it as a preventative method and to help repair the damage I have done. It has improved not just my knees in the couple months of me taking this, but also my finger joints (I work on a pc all day and this really did help with my hands!), my toes (too many kicks into wooden boards and heavy bags left them cracking EVER morning now... not so much), and even my neck. I will finish this bottle and be done for now, but I will definitely be coming back for another round of this every 10 years or so. I may update this review again after I have finished the bottle (I only take 1 in the morning since I do not have any real medical conditions requiring it) and I will report back if my joints degrade sharply afterwards etc. So far I have been hella happy and I DO recommend this. I did not receive any discounts like other reviewers are stating, but I'd also like to point out that there are many other trusted brand names out there. Don't buy junk and do your homework.

title: 1/2 the dosage per serving as standard products.
body: Most glucosamine and MSM products give you "one serving" that provides 1500 mg of each.  This product cuts that in half, so that one serving is only 750 mg.  That means you have to take TWICE as much to get the standard dose.  That makes this product twice as expensive as most others.  Rather deceptive promotion.

title: If I did not know better I would say these capsules are glued shut
body: The reason I purchase capsules is so I can open the capsule and mix it into my dog's food twice daily.  If I did not know better I would say these capsules are glued shut.  It takes me forever to open and I usually have to take a pair of scissors to cut in half with the contents going everywhere.  I won't buy this brand again, even though it is made in the USA.
